text:

Since root canals are not very fun to begin with I think this was probably the best it could have been. Dr. Swicord was very good to explain everything he was doing as we went along and postop instructions were were very thorough. All in all it was a very pleasant experience.

resp.text:

Had to go get new dentures somewhere else because they DO NOT GUARANTEE their services!   My dentures from them are horrendous.  Every time I went in it was said they supposed to look like that.  No they do not my new ones fit perfect!!!!
My new dentures sit inside the ones from tooth masters they were so big and didn’t fit. I have had them 10 months
They will not refund or fix them.  I got a certified letter stating they do not guarantee their services on dentures.    What company doesn’t guarantee their work?   The dental board will be called.  She tried to put white stuff all on it to just try to put a bandaids on it.   The roof of the denture as u can see her s big as a dime.  I kept choking  I’m so very disappointed

THIS IS WRONG ON SO MANY LEVELS

The smile of just my teeth are my new dentures.

text: Dr. Pugh and his staff made my first visit a very pleasant experience. I was a new patient with quite a lot of problems. name: Jacob Williams
text: Dr. Pugh was great! Very friendly and professional. First time I’ve ever been to the dentist and didn’t feel a thing, from the anesthesia to the crown prep. I will actually look forward to going to the dentist office again

name: Kenny Kirkland
text: I've always had issues going to the dentist until I started using Dr. Pugh. He is the best, as is everyone that works with him. He puts me at ease and it's as comfortable as possibly can be. I recommend him without reservation.

name: Joyce Montgomery
text: Dr. Pugh and his staff are very professional and friendly. He was kind enough not to charge me for some minor work he did on two of my teeth. Also, he takes a conservative approach to dental work, i.e. rather than suggesting a crown, he tries to save teeth with other means whenever possible. This, combined with his topnotch friendly staff, allows me to recommend Dr. Pugh to anyone.

name: Emily Whitworth
text: A perfectionist, Dr. Pugh bonded a tooth for me and I can't believe how natural it looks it literally gave me back my confidence. A side note the staff he has working with him are sweet ladies that are very professional. This is the place to go get your work done! This is the 3rd bonding of the same tooth and by far this is the best my smile has looked!

name: carolyn banks
text: I got a root canal today. It looks amazing.  I need a lot of dental work and I am excited to see how the end results will look.   The Dr is awesome. I recommended him to my mom.  She needs some work done.   The staff is friendly as usual and they try to make you comfortable. Definitely 5 stars. Would give him six if I could. ☺

text: I have been Dr Pugh’s patient for over 20 years.  He has an excellent staff from receptionists to hygienists to billing personnel.  They are all friendly, kind, and the hygienists are gentle during cleanings, which is such a positive attribute for me.  I have recommended Dr. Pugh and his staff many times over the years, and each friend has told me that they too think they are excellent.  If you are looking for a new dentist, I highly recommend contacting Dr. Pugh.

text: We love our dentist!  Super clean office, wonderful staff, expert and efficient care, and very kind!  The whole team at Artistic Dentistry takes great care of my family!

text: Dr. Pugh is professional, knowledgeable, and has a great bedside manner. The dental hygienists are friendly and thorough while making you feel comfortable the whole time. I would highly recommend this office.

text: Awesome Staff!  Very respectful of patient’s time, 0700 appointments start at 0700. Hygienist are pleasant, friendly and professional.  Dentist appointment is more like catching up with friends you only see a couple times a year.  It is said that the culture of any business stems from the values of its leader(s).  Once you meet Dr. Pugh you understand this is true.  He has a great sense of humor and you know he is concerned about you as an individual, not just another patient. He listens to your concerns and creates a plan for you.  Great bunch of people!!!

name: David Burkett
text:
I received dental care at Artistic Dentistry today.
All of the employees were very friendly and helpful.
Dr. Pugh and his assistant, were very professional and made my procedure painless as possible.
I recommend this dentistry to anyone needing care.

text: I've been a patient of Dr. Pugh's for many years. The quality of service he and his staff provide is impeccable. You feel like family when you are there.

text: Superior service and friendly professional staff. 6 family members, never a bad experience, ever! Dr Pugh and his entire staff love their patients and work to make their dental experience as pleasant as possible. I highly recommend this dentist!

text: I have been a patient for over 15 years. The staff and Dr. Pugh have always been a pleasure and I truly look forward to every visit. I would highly recommend them for all your dental needs.

text: Best dental experience I’ve ever had! Great staff!

name: Miranda Johnson
text: This was my first visit to Dr, Pughs office and I was so nervous. The staff here is absolutely amazing! They understood that I was nervous and kept me so calm.  Lauren is amazing! This will be the only Dentist Office I will use! Thank you so much!

name: Michael Cackowski
text:
Dr Pugh has been my dentist for quite a few years, since 2010.  I came to him because my former beloved dentist was retiring.  Dr Pugh was a breath of fresh air -- he brought a new approach to my dental care!  He demonstrated his exceptional artistry to  correct a significant problem with my  TMJ and overbite, which caused one of my crowns to come loose.  My tooth  was repaired with a root canal and a new crown was inserted.Since 2011, Dr Pugh has worked, diligently, to ensure that i have the best possible dental care.  He is a talented, dedicated and very capable dentist.  Love Dr Pugh!

Second review - above is another family member.  This is mine - friendly and  knowledgeable and took time to discuss my case with me.  His staff is great.

name: Beth Reid
text: Had veneers done today and they are life changing for me.  Dr. Pugh and Dena went out of their way to put me at ease and make the procedure as comfortable as possible!  They were very informative and kept me in the loop as they proceeded.  I found that extremely comforting!  The quality of their work and their meticulous manner of perfection certainly exceeded my expectations!  Thank you so much for giving me back my smile!

name: navyvet83
text: I had a crown done at Dr. Pugh’s office and it was a quick and painless experience. Thank you Dr. Pugh!

name: Debra Shockley
text:
Dr. Pugh and staff are wonderful caring people.
I have never been disappointed.
Feels like I’m with family when I’m there.
Excellent dental care , as well!!! Love

name: Douglas Engle
text: Painless treatment, professional and highly skilled dentist and staff,  timely, clean environment and rigorous procedures to maintain it and you walk out with excellent results. What more do you need to know? I had two fillings and a crown replacement and left on schedule. Very happy patient here!

name: Karen Channell Rich
text: Dr. Pugh and his entire staff are the best! They are always upbeat, friendly and happy to accommodate any needs you may have. Since going to Dr. Pugh my fear of the trip to the dentist is gone. I use to get anxious about dental visits due to some bad experiences with other dentists. I have had alot of dental work done and Dr. Pugh makes every effort to keep you comfortable and pain free. He is the best at giving shots slowly and numbing you up as he does so. Dr. Pugh appears to keep up with new technology and techniques. He is great about communicating with you and educating you regarding any procedure and your options. His dental assistants and hygienists are cheerful and competent. Dr. Pugh is also great about taking you on time with little or no wait time. My grown kids now use his office and are very happy also. There is absolutely nothing that needs to change in the way Dr. Pugh and his staff run his office. I highly recommend using Dr.Pugh!

name: Anne Wesley
text: I have been Dr Michael Pugh's patient for 20+ years.  The office is run very efficiently with no wait, the staff is skilled and always pleasant.  I truly enjoy my semi-annual visits and would not hesitate to recommend Dr. Pugh for all dental needs.

name: Nathan Best
text: I had a cracked tooth while I was out of town during the holidays. Not only did Dr. Pugh reach out while every other dentist was closed but gave me guidance while I was on vacation. I was in extreme pain, when I visited an oral surgeon out of town the guy told me to just wait and see my dentist and that he couldn’t solve the issue. I got a crown as soon as I got back in town and Dr. Pugh figured out exactly the root cause. I will never see another Dentist ever in my life besides Dr. Pugh. He is genuine to the bone and so are his staff!!!!!

name: Margarett Merryman
text: Never a bad experienc! Dr Pugh , Office personal and Hygienist always pleasant and helpful. My mouth feels good and my teeth smooth as glass after routine 6 months checkup.

name: Bryan Anderson
text: The staff is so friendly and the dr is great at what he does but mrs.farmer she is great and I love coming back seeing her she is great at her job :)

name: Stephanie Cashin
text: I tell everyone about Dr. Pugh!  He and his staff are the friendliest and most kind group of people you will ever meet.  The care that goes into each visit and keeping their patients healthy is unprecedented.  When I took a new job and had the option to go with the company's dental insurance or purchase my own I called to make sure they would still accept the company's dental insurance, that's how serious I am about not going to another dentist!

name: Parker Martin
text:
I have been going to Dr. Pugh for many years after searching for the perfect dentist. I finally found him and wouldn’t go anywhere else! Dr. Pugh is simply the best when it comes to teeth- he is incomparable and the very best in the city!
He and his staff are always so warm and welcoming and will make you at ease. They simply make things effortless. They’re wonderful.
Lisa, Pam and Tricia are the best dental hygienists I’ve ever been to! I hardly feel a thing, yet my teeth are so thoroughly cleaned and polished after each sitting. I go every 6 months, without fail, which is easy to do when it’s so effortless. I used to dread going to the dentist for teeth cleanings, but these ladies make it so enjoyable. I saw Lisa this visit and she is truly kind and caring and takes such good care of my teeth, as if they were her own.
I feel like Dr. Pugh’s office truly cares about me and my teeth and I know each and every time I visit that my teeth are in the best possible hands!

DrPugh was also very courteous and explained everything in a manner that I understood. The equipment was clean and state of the art compared to what I have seen at other dentist offices! The facility was also very comfortable and homey!

name: Mary Lynne
text: After reading the previous review I had to post my own review of this office.  I have been a patient over 10 years.  Lynn and Amy work the front office and provide excellent service and dedication not only to Dr. Pugh but to his patients.  Since the front office is open to the lobby you can hear every conversation these ladies have with patients, insurance companies and staff. It has never been anything but professional.  They greet every  patient coming in the door with a smile, good morning and how is your family.  They call and get appointments for patients with specialists, they contact insurance companies to find out what your coverage will be for needed dental work and about visits that aren't paid for what ever reason.   Last year I had a bill that was not paid by my insurance company $1,500, I called them and they said it wasn't covered and would be my responsibility.  I paid the bill.  Amy called me about a month later and told me that she had contacted the insurance company and sent an appeal she got the bill paid and now had a refund check for me!  The office had been paid by me there was no reason for Amy to do this but she went above and beyond her duties to help me get my money back.  The previous review by Devon Abram is completely unfounded and untrue!  Amazing office with excellent staff!!!!

name: Heather Crumbley
text: Dr. Pugh and his staff are absolutely the best. Myself and my two daughters, 12 yrs old & 8 yrs old always have fun when we go to Dr. Pugh’s office. This dentist and his employees are amazing and almost like family (I'm the crazy cousin everyone talks about).  Pam, my hygienist through thick and thin, is the best and so is Dr. Pugh.  The front desk staff (Lynn rocks) are awesome and I wouldn't think about going anywhere else.  I wouldn't hesitate to recommend Dr. Pugh to anyone and I have (and will again)!  Dr. Pugh, you rock (for a dentist).   :)

name: Brian Yount
text: I went to Dr.Pugh’s office after many years of not going to the dentist (over 25 years) out of fear of possibly loosing teeth and hearing horror stories about other people’s dentists. When I arrived, I was greeted and made very comfortable and watched a informational video in the lobby about everything they can do in their office and viewed some before and after stories. This helped me take my mind off of my nerves before going back to meeting the hygienist. After a very detailed cleaning I was very pleased to learn that I did not have to lose any teeth at all! The results were night and day from the first visit. My wife’s entire office uses him as well as some of my coworkers and I could not give Dr. Pugh and his team a higher rating. They go above and beyond making you comfortable and I have yet to hear anything negative about him or his office which is very surprising. As an adult being afraid of going to the dentist, I am really kicking myself for not going to them much sooner, but I am so lucky/happy that I went to them for my dental needs. Since the first visit I have had several cleanings, tooth bonding as well as a whitening treatment and every time I came in it was like we just picked up the conversation from months prior without hesitation. If I had one regret, that is not going to him when I moved to Huntsville many years ago.

text:
I Dont recommend this doctor, I had treatment for cavities,my experience there was extremely discouraging. First,they called you to come in,then I sat in a room waiting for the dentist,the nurse told me he will be here 'in a minute', I waited for (40) minutes.Yes. ( I even wanted to leave),I could hear the dentist in the other room giving a treatment. Every while, a nurse would come in and say 'the dentist will be here soon'!!!.?why they leave the patient waiting for over half an hour?That is disrespectful...

Second,before I went to the clink, I called my health insurance and knew how much is my copay(I paid it ),yet when I finished and walked out, they called me and asked me to pay More,why?I asked, they said the health insurance will not pay for a certain procedure I had.I told them I had called my insurance company and they told me they Will.Then the nurse said:Well,they will but they will pay little?? I told them I will call my insurance comapny to check this,then if I have to pay this extra,I will. She said: well we dont do this, normally a patient has to pay now,but I will make you an exception,you can pay later (I walked out wondering: If she would not make the exception,what would happen to me? locked in a room there?until I pay).
They would smile to you and behave friendly,but they dont have any true concern,all what matters to them is how much they can make you pay in the end. I will Not go again to this clink. If it happens and you choose it, first call your insurance and make sure of all the details,then call the clinic and confirm the details.All this Before you have the actual treatment. Then when you are there,  if they tell you, we will do  certain procedure..certain treatment...immediately ask: is this included within the health insurance coverage?how much is my copay? I know it might be difficult while you are sitting for treatment and your mouth is numbed,but Do it. Another advice, prepare yourself for (their 1 minute wait ) which means 40 or more of waiting....waiting...

text: I was terrified to go to the dentist. Dr. Bennett and his staff were extremely empathetic. They took time to explain in detail exactly what they were doing and were very patient with me. I will definitely feel comfortable next time going back to this office.

name: Kitty Katt
text: This is literally the best dentist I have ever seen.  I am usually very nervous about seeing the dentist and I have had some pretty horrible experiences in the past with the dentist. I also have a few medical issues that make it even worse, so I am so hesitant on going. I had to though due to a cracked tooth and I was looking for a dentist near me. I came across Capstone many times by searching online and asking around. So, I called and scheduled. Boy, am I glad that I picked Capstone! This is the best dentist around and I actually want to go there again! The staff is so awesome, each and every one. And the Dr., she is a miracle worker! The sweetest most understanding and gentle dentist I have ever seen. I had a tooth extracted, and for once in my life, it went so well that I was not scared at all. Not to mention that I was in no pain. She did such a great job and took such good care of me. She even reassured me that if I had any concerns, I could call her anytime. Thank you so much Capstone dental, you are truly a blessing!

This is an awesome dental practice. Dr Dixon and colleta are really great. Thank you for my dental care.

I love that they send the courtesy via msg and email. If you’re needing additional work done , they’re very great with referrals and they even called to have my appointment setup as well. If I could give them 5 stars & 10 thumbs up I would !! Thanks for all you do!!

text:
It's a bit hard to find, being tucked up in the back of a strip mall located off the highway, and requires a U-turn to get to if you're coming from the school. The location has baffled more than a few of my uber drivers.

But the service itself is great; the office is very clean and pretty, the staff are polite and prompt, and the service is ideal. They haven't yet tried to upsell me some braces, so that gets them a five star rating in my book.

text: I have been going here for years they are always polite, professional, and always happy to help you with your dental needs. I highly recommend choosing Capstone Dental.

text: Great dentist and hygienists. They are very safe and clean. My family and I have gotten excellent care from Dr. Dickson and her staff for everything from routine cleanings to mouth guards to very complex reconstruction with porcelain veneers. Always very attentive and great results!

text: This has been a great practice for me and my family for several years. Very friendly staff, great hygenist and I love my dentist. Dr. Dickson is the best!

text: Capstone Dental Care has been wonderful over the last 2 years that I have been seeing them. They are always available for last minute emergency dental work. text: I had the best experience at Capstone. I was extremely anxious due to a previous horrible dental experience 5 years ago at another dental office. So I basically avoided the dentist for 5 years. From the moment I walked in I knew this was going to be the day I finally get some help. The entire staff was extremely professional and treated me like family. Dr. Bennett spoke to me and explained everything thoroughly. Everyone went above and beyond to help me. I HIGHLY recommend them. You won’t regret it!!! Thanks again for everything!!!!

Everyone was great in the office and I am ecstatic to find somewhere I feel comfortable and don't have to go all over town to get each step of care done.

If you are one of those people who "hate the dentist", I think you would change your mind after being seen here.

text: The front staff have always been great & quick to answer any questions I have! My hygienist Vickie always make coming to the dentist a pleasant experience as do both doctors! Keep up the great work!!!!

name: Elise Goubet
text:
Everything and everyone at Capstone Dental Care is phenomenal. Their service is fast and efficient and I have never had to wait more than 10 minutes to get called back. I am usually in and out in less than an hour, even the last time when I had to have a filling. For my 6-month check-ups they give reminder calls early enough in advance to re-schedule if I need to. The back office and front office staff are incredibly helpful and nice. When I locked my keys in my car and went back in to see if I could wait in their office until someone could bring my spare keys, the front office staff was so helpful. They asked if I needed to use their phone to call someone and offered me water and coffee, amazing service!
I just don't have enough great things to say about this office!

text: Never really liked the dentist... However, They made sure I was comfortable and cared for. Huge shoutout to Tara she performed my cleaning and she has the hands of an angel!

text: I have been a patient for several years now and definitely plan to continue. They have a great atmosphere from folks like Mandy Thomas up front to those taking great care of my teeth. Thank you fir all that you do!!!

name: Kailey Check
text: I really needed to dump my old dentist and was intrigued by the reviews for this one - after my visit today I can say they are 100% accurate. Everything was fast and efficient, the building and staff are plentiful to accommodate multiple patients at one time, so do not fret if you feel like you are in a sea of people in the waiting room. Dr. Bennett was thorough and informative - he showed me what he was talking about with a mirror as well as the x-ray, and took his time explaining areas of concern and why or how they occur. My dental hygienist (Stephanie!) was also fantastic. I did not feel rushed, shamed, or confused during this visit. I will definitely be back.

name: Barbara Moroz
text: Everyone is great! Dr. Bennett and Vickie always take care of me.

text: Extremely friendly front staff! The hygienist, Noelle, is extremely knowledgeable and does an excellent job!

name: kristi mullis
text: Changed dentist due to insurance and needed a filling, so I was told when I went for my appt. scheduled a time to come back for filing, only to come back a few days later with terrible tooth pain. Another X-ray and was told I needed a root canal. All that pain for the filing useless now having to go back in and get a root canal. Been back several times after my root canal and I'm still in pain. I'm not dentist but a root canal means there is no root, therefore I shouldn't still be in pain after almost 3 months later. Changing dentist and hope to get some answers. I didn't even get a chance to have my families appts because the trouble I've had, I don't want them to experience it.

name: JT Odom
text: Thank you to Dr John Bennett and his team. I can finally smile again.

name: Gary S
text: Great staff, always very friendly and professional!

name: Michael Burdick
text: Best dental care ever!

name: Cheryl Goree
text:
Long story, short...Had a few issues with them. #1 Lack of honesty
#2 Lack of knowledge
#3 Lack of care and concern
Whispering and gestures among a few of the associates, when they were confronted about dental work. A crown job that took three hours over the estimated time, and as it turned out, had to have the crown taken off and replaced by another dentist, so I went through five hours of hell, for nothing more than two more hours of hell.  Being charged more at check out, than what I was told it would cost. Filed a grievance with my insurance provider, and after their investigation, Capstone was advised to reimburse me. I haven't even gotten a response from them, and it has been seven months.

name: Lynn McColl
text: Love this dental office!  Especially Mandy and her help with my insurance, she made the difference!

name: Damon Holland
text:
My son, a freshman, 7 hours away from, chipped his front two teeth. He asked the dentist to just repair/bond them to hold him until he can get home. His aunt is his dentist and could take care of the rest. The dentist was insistent on wanting him to have over a thousand dollars worth of treatment. I spoke with(& showed x-rays)to other dentists & endodontist.  After seeing them they all agreed he did not need a double root canal, crown etc... he was not in any pain. He spoke down to my son for what he had requested to be preformed. The tooth chipped off 6 hours after he bonded the tooth.  My son had to go back two days later to have it repaired. The dentist was cocky and when finishing with the repair he didn't even shake my sons hand or have anything good to say when leaving the room.
I think he was mad that we stood our ground and didn't let him run a new college student over the coals with his thousands of dollars worth of charges. I am a physician. I couldn't imagine taking advantage of a young college student and their families that are many hours away and not every family can come up with over a thousand dollars in an instant for something that can wait. Thankfully we had other professionals to guide us.

text: The staff is always awesome!

text: We were coming in from out of town and my crown snapped on my front tooth. They worked me in and even saw me early since we got into town earlier than expected. resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review Liz!  We so appreciate your thoughtfulness here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry!  We hope you enjoyed the concert and safely made it home!

name: Randy Wedel
text: I was in Gulf Shores on a family vacation and chipped a tooth. Concerned that I might have cracked the tooth I searched for a local dental practice that could help in a hurry. Thanks to Google reviews I lucked out and found Dr Edwards and Doctor Long. I was in the chair quickly and Dr Long did a thorough evaluation and gave me three options. Since I was there I chose to have the tooth repaired. 20 quick minutes I was fixed and on the way back to the beach. Painless, professional, and very kind. Also thanks to Lu Lu for scheduling me in so quickly and assisting in the procedure. I can assure you If I lived in the area, these would be my dentists. Thanks again Dr Long

resp.text: Randy, we so appreciate the 5 STAR review!  Here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry we try to accommodate our emergencies so that they may enjoy their vacations!  We hope you had a great time at the beach!

name: Aubrey Bianco
text: The women at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry are kind, caring, and very professional. The office space is beautiful and clean, and they take responsible COVID precautions to keep everyone as safe as possible. They all had my best interest at heart during procedures, whether that was a simple teeth cleaning or tooth filling. Dr. Mary was even willing to fit me in for an additional filling the same day, even if that meant cutting her lunch a little short....oh, and not to mention, that was on all on her birthday!! I recommend these ladies to anyone and everyone visiting the island or living here full time!

resp.text: Thank you Aubrey for the sweet review:)  We appreciate you as a patient here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry and glad we can help!

name: Matt Mcclane
text: Absolutely amazing family of dentists. Always polite and very helpful have always got me right in especially if it’s an emergency I drive over an hour to see them every time. The only dentists I will use.

resp.text: Thank you Matt for the 5 STAR review!  We hope you are well and call us here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry if you need anything!

name: Sue Ann B
text: I would give them 10 stars if I could 😀!  I called with an emergency when I broke my tooth and they were able to get me in.  Everyone in the office was so kind and caring.  Kim took the time to explain everything they were going to do and stayed with me through the entire process.  Dr. Long was amazing and one of the best dentist I have ever been to!  She was able to repair my tooth and made sure I was comfortable during the procedure.  I would highly recommend them!  They represent the best of the best of Gulf Shores!

resp.text: Thank you so much Sue Ann! It was a pleasure to treat you here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry and look forward to seeing you again!

name: Pat Nadolski
text: My husband and I spend winters in Gulf Shores.  On New Year’s Day I broke a molar and was very concerned about finding a dentist.  No worries, we were able to make an emergency appointment to see Dr. Mary.  What a positive experience!  Everyone was professional and best of all friendly, showing a genuine interest in getting to know a little about me personally.  I highly recommend this practice.  We will definitely return here for all of our dental needs.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words, we enjoy having you as a patient here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry.

name: Shelly Sharkey
text: An awful experience. Easily spent 45 mins in Dr Pamela Edwards office without ever even speaking to the doctor and basically just lectured at and sent away with no resolution. Called a different dentist the same day and within a week, my daughter has had a full exam, xrays and multiple apts completed and has her front teeth fixed and her smile back, which everyone deserves. I was just dumbfounded that the doctor wouldn’t even come out of her personal office to speak to us as a new patient in her office, and the condescending treatment by her assistant or hygienist or whoever she was, was mind blowing.  Let alone the issues to even get an appointment scheduled in the first place and then it was the “wrong type” appointment I was informed when we arrived. Don’t worry about my too complicated daughters case Dr. Edwards, it was easily resolved by another Dentist willing to take the time.

resp.text: Hi Shelly, We would like to apologize for your negative experience. We’re normally known for our exceptional patient care, and we regret that we missed the mark. My name is Bryan and I am the office manager. If you’d like to discuss this further, please contact me at (251) 500-1025 so we can work toward making this right.

name: Glenda Sickles
text: This dentistry office is incredible.  I'm a Snowbird in Gulf Shores, Alabama and had a bridge fall out.  Away from home with a dental problem...what to do?  Family Dentistry has an ad in the local paper that they  love winter guests and accept emergencies.  I was both!!  They gave me an appointment the next day, took impressions, pulled a tooth and in three weeks I had a new bridge.  Dr. Mary Edwards-Long is kind, compassionate, and all procedures were pain-free.  She is friendly and we visited like old friends.  Her assistants, Kim 1 and Kim 2, were equally caring and efficient.  The whole office was careful with Covid 19 practices in place.  I can highly recommend this dentistry office!

resp.text: Thank you so much Glenda for the stellar 5 star review!  We so enjoyed having you as a patient this winter here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry  and hope you stop by to say hello when you return next winter!

name: Renee Ziegelbauer
text: It was a very satisfying experience. Got an appointment right away and everyone was very friendly. Dr Edwards fixed my broken tooth as good as new and I never felt a thing. I recommend this practice highly.

resp.text: Thank you Renee for the stellar 5 star review!  You were a pleasure here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry and we hope you have a wonderful time in our small beach town!

name: Laurence Waterford
text: Painless, efficient, and reasonable! It was easy to get a new patient appointment:) Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you Laurence for the 5 star review!  We look forward to seeing you again here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry!

text: Dr. Long and staff are fantastic. Very friendly and I know I’m in good hands with them. Every experience there has been top notch! Thanks so much!

resp.text: Dear Lizzy, thank you so very much for the lovely review. We enjoy having you as a patient here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry and hope all is well with you and yours. Please come by and see us anytime!

resp.text: Thank you so much David for your kind words. We love having you as a patient here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry. See you next time.

name: Kim Tittle

The dentist and the receptionists made wife and husband both feel at ease. Hubby says if we didn’t live 1000 miles away they would be our primary dentist office. Thank you ladies for all of your effort and making both hubby and myself less stressed about an already stressful situation.

resp.text: Mrs. Trimpey, Thank you so much for the 5 STAR google review!  We are happy we could help in your time of need and please come visit us here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry if you are ever in the area again to say hello:)

I highly recommend this dentist office.  The dentist, assistant, and office staff are exceptional.  Wish they were in my home state.  I’d switch dentist if they were.

resp.text: Thank you so much Dot for the stellar 5 star google review!  We hope you had a wonderful weekend and we would be happy to take care of you next time you are down here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry:)

text:
I am astounded by the absolutely stellar care & treatment I received from Dr. Edwards as well as her entire team. I have put off much needed dental work for years and am so grateful to be following through with this office.

I felt beyond at ease during my appointments which involve receiving crowns; all of my interactions with everyone apart of this team has far exceeded all of my expectations.

I am especially grateful for their professional/gentle/educational approach; very thankful for all their assistance in working with our confusing insurance issues!

I highly recommend Dr. Edwards and her excellent team; looking forward to their services in the future.  So happy to finally having all of my teeth & maintaining my smile!

resp.text: Wow Amie!  We so appreciate the awesome review of us here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry!

resp.text: Thank you Taylor for the awesome google review of us here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry and so happy you're feeling better!

name: Derek
text:
The absolute most reliable, friendly, and efficient dentist and staff you’ll not just find in Gulf Shores, but in Alabama. Period.

Doctor Mary, Kat, Brian (and the entire team) fixed my teeth and made my cosmetic experience actually enjoyable. They also made me feel great about myself, so I can’t thank them enough. The best in the biz.

resp.text: Thank you, we look forward to seeing you again.

name: Tamoya Thompson
text: If I could rate their office more than a 5 star, I absolutely would. I had a cleaning done and 2 fillings last week, and it was such a great experience. Nobody describes having to get a filling as a great experience, but from the minute you are greeted upon entrance right through the dental process was just absolutely great service right through. I would recommend here to anyone. Both Dr. Edwards's are amazing and their wonderful staff. I have more dental work to get done and I don't  plan on going anywhere else but here!! Thank you guys a million times!!

resp.text: Thank you, hope to see you soon here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry .

name: Carol Fountain
text: It was last Friday I saw Dr Mary Edwards. I was in a lot of pain from a problem tooth and my regular dentist was not open on Friday..Dr Edwards was a God-send to me. I was able to get in to see her right away and she and her staff were able to determine my problem, refer me to specialist , and give me an antibiotic prescription to get me by until I could be seen by my regular dentist in 4 days. Her office is warm and welcoming and I would switch dentists if my insurance would let me. Cannot say enough good things about the whole experience.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words of us here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry .

name: Betty Kelley
text:
Came to Gulf Shores for family vacation.  First family drama was my bridge falling out.
I also have a terrible fear of dentists.  Thank goodness for Dr. Edwards.  They had me fixed by 10 am Monday morning.  They could not have nicer, more professional and caring.  I wish she was in my hometown. Dr. Edwards and her staff are the best!

resp.text: Thank you so much, we are here if you need us again at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry.

name: Dana Given
text:
Just came from my first visit at Dr. Edwards office. Everyone was great; from the initial appointment phone call two days ago;  to check in today (even when there was a glitch with my insurance); to X-rays, teeth cleaning, and follow up with Dr. Edwards.

Very professional and friendly staff; respectful with the glitch - which got resolved while I was in the dentist chair; gentle and thorough dental care.

It’s always scary trying to find a new dentist when you relocate - but I can highly recommend this office - whose entire staff obviously cares about their patients.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words.

name: Kathlene Smith
text: If you need an emergency crown replacement as I did,  this is the place to go! this is a family strong dental business and they treated us like family as well!  Thank you for your excellent service and care!

resp.text: Thank you so much Kathlene!  You are part of the Edwards Family now and we hope y'all have a wonderful trip!

name: Judi Farmer
text: I’m from out of town and went in for emergency help. Dr. Mary treated me and she is awesome! She diagnosed a cracked tooth and treated me on the spot. Dr. Mary and her staff were super caring. They even gave me a piece of king cake and a box of valentine chocolates when I left. What a super family team!

resp.text: Judi, we so appreciate the kind review of us here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry !  You are part of the Edwards Family:)

name: Edward Williams
text: I was on vacation with my family when I chipped a tooth. Started thinking of a good story to tell my friends about how it happened. My wife said to call around to see if anyone could fix it. Dr. Edwards and her staff fit me in that day! Prices were fair and the doctor was fantastic. I was walking out smiling. Would recommend to anyone needing emergency or cosmetic treatment!

resp.text:
Dear Edward,

We are so happy we were able to help you in your time of need!  It was a pleasure to meet you and  your family.  We hope the rest of your vacation was wonderful and please stop by to say hello to us here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry whenever you are back in the area!

name: Sarah Halford
text: We are visiting the area and my husband was incorrectly diagnosed by the minor med clinic after a week and 2 visits.  Dr Mary and her staff were able to see him right away, discover the real problem and get him on the road to recovery. The whole staff were knowledgeable and very caring. We will highly recommend their office to others.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words of us here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry.

name: Jash Yotes
text:
The Edwards run a fantastic dental practice - whether it's locals or out-of-towners with dental emergencies.

Pamela and Mary so thoughtful, intelligent, and excellent at making patients feel welcome & cared for.

They're great with locals, (I'm one, ha!) but they've really distinguished themselves in what they're willing to do to accommodate all the visitors that we have in town with their dental emergencies. (And are the FIRST to tell folks on the phone that they need to go elsewhere [like the emergency room] if the problem sounds like a medical priority.)

Anyone on the fence should feel excellent about trusting the Edwards. They're a great, skilled, family run practice that are going to look out for their patients' best interest first.

Love you guys!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words.

name: Kinsley Lively
text: Such a wonderful experience!! I’m usually a little nervous about dentist appointments but the staff here was so welcoming and friendly. Dr. Edwards, the younger one, was so knowledgeable about my concerns (wisdom teeth coming in) and Star did a phenomenal job cleaning my teeth!! Pearly whites for the win! 😁

resp.text: Thank you, hope to see you again here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry.

name: Mike M
text:
I like to just say this is the best and most friendly dentist 🦷 office around
I just had work done and very professional
People 5 stars if I could give 10 stars I would
Highly recommended !!
They have a 24 hour emergency service if needed
Sincerely
Mike

resp.text: Dear Mike, Thank you so much for the kind review!  We look forward to seeing you again!

name: Vincent Odom
text: This office was great.  They worked with my crazy schedule to get me seen and their rates were very reasonable.  On top of that, their staff was very personable and polite.  I definitely recommend this dental office.

resp.text: Thank you, let us know if you need our service again here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry.

name: kristin kilborn
text: Wonderful and friendly staff. Just moved to the area and I have found my dentist. I must say I was a little nervous and they put my mind at ease!!

resp.text: Thank you Kristin for the awesome review of us here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry and please let us know if you need anything!

name: Kirk Flowers
text: Had a tooth that my dentist at home had been monitoring for the last few check ups. In the first week of my winter vacation, it broke off. Got an appointment the next day with Dr Edwards and 7 days later, she installed a crown. It feels great. Highly recommended.

resp.text: Thanks for the five-star review of us here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry . We really appreciate your support.

name: Rachel Pody
text: A great lady dentist that is caring, fun, and funny. I was very happy with my visit. Dr. Mary Edwards  was extremely professional, skilled and friendly. The office was very clean, modern, and at the same time felt like a home; which is a huge plus. On my first visit which was an emergency I could tell that the staff cared and I wasn't just another patient but a human being that was in pain, and they empathized with me and wanted to help me(Very different than one of my visits to a different dentist in town). They even took the time to make small talk with me. Every visit since then has been great. Strongly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you for the lovely google review Rachel of us here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry!

name: onakay
text: Amazing service! So family friendly, patient, and genuine. I was unable to get work done due to the fact that they don't accept Medicaid, but their excellent service honestly made up for it! When I get official dental health coverage, I will certainly be returning 💕💕

resp.text: Thank you! Can't wait to see you again here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry.

name: Thomas Francis
text: Great experience! I am a snowbird who broke/cracked two molars with very old large fillings. I was able to get a same day appointment with Dr Edwards. She conducted a thorough examination and we had a frank discussion about courses of action. I chose to have two crowns. Within a week I had two new crowns. Dr Edwards and her staff were polite, professional, and extremely competent. I would and have recommend Dr Edwards.

resp.text: Thank you for the lovely google review Mr. Francis of us here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry!

name: Whitney Day
text: This will definitely be my go to dentist from now on! I had an awful toothache and they got me right in and the very next week got me in for a cleaning! The staff is so sweet and personable and made me feel completely at ease!

resp.text: Thank you and thank you for the referral to us here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry!

name: Jennifer Farris
text: Amazing staff and wonderful doctor. Was there on vacation and I had recently had a root canal done at home before going on vacation. I had extreme pain for the last few days of my trip.  I called to see if they could work me in, they got me in immediately.  Turned out the molar behind the tooth I had the root canal in was cracked. name: Shantel Ervin
text: As a cancer warrior, I have had my share of doctors appointments, treatments, surgical procedures and more. Because of this my pain threshold is high so if I say something hurts it really hurts. My previous dental office was aware of this yet the hygienist chose to ignore the pain I was experiencing. After speaking with the office manager I decided I would not complete my appointment and later called back and canceled any further treatment with that practice. I called my insurance company and located the office of a previous dentist that I loved and I am so glad I did. I called Bryant Dental on Bob Wallace and even the interaction over the phone was pleasant. Whitney was able to schedule me an appointment quickly and educated me on the processes and procedures and what to expect. I could hear her smile through the phone. The day of my appointment, the entire staff was absolutely wonderful! As a new patient for the practice I knew I would have paperwork and would probably be there for a while but as soon as I finished my paperwork my hygienist was waiting for me. Chelsey greeted me with smiling eyes (she had on her mask), explained the process in depth and after reviewing my x-rays she recommended the best next step to help with my issues. She listened and made sure to understand what I was experiencing and throughout my appointment she made sure the process was not causing too much pain. With tender swollen gums pain is to be expected however if the hygienist knows what they are doing the patient will experience minimal pain. Chelsey knows what she is doing! She took a potentially mouth throbbing, tears running uncomfortable situation and made it a pleasant and educational experience. I went in with my mouth feeling awful and because of what Chelsey did my teeth feel so much better. Because I am a cancer warrior my teeth and gums have gone through some major changes. Chemo, radiation and long term medication has caused damage that I thought was going to take radical treatment to repair but Chelsey explained how to minimize further damage and what to do to get me on a path of recovery. She was absolutely amazing! I highly recommend Bryant Dental on Bob Wallace, you will not be disappointed.

resp.text: Wow to that wonderful review!  We are so happy to hear about your great experience with us!  We will pass these sweet words you shared on to the staff and especially let Chelsey and Whitney know :)

name: Colleen Sauls
text: Let me save some of you the trouble. They use Transworld System collection agency when Tonya makes a mistake with your treatment plan and tells you your insurance will pay half and you pay the other half ($560) and then it turns out TONYA read it wrong but expects the patient to pay for her mistake you will get turned over to a collection agency! I liked Dr. Bentley and was very disappointed she let her office manager get away with dirty office practices, so I had no other choice but to find another dentist for my son and I. Tonya wouldn’t let me speak to Dr. Bentley she twisted what happened to fit her narrative and let Dr.Bentley think they were doing me a favor by cutting the bill in half when all along Tonya knows this is on her! And she sent a $240 bill to collections on a procedure that wasn’t even done correctly (we were told my son didn’t need a crown turns out he did but because of Tonyas error reading our policy which is her job by the way we never went back to Dr.Bentley after getting a $500 bill in the mail no phone call Tonya knew I would be upset and she knew exactly what she told me) and the tooth had to be extracted after all of that! So NO  I do not recommend you go there! Not because of Dr. Bentley but because you cannot trust Tonya to do your insurance and billing correctly! Do you have an extra $1000.00  laying around when you get a surprise bill from Tonya? When I asked Tonya why she didn’t catch that the insurance wouldn’t cover that procedure she said to me well neither did you! Wow!! Tonya claimed to have gotten an approval for the procedure when all along root canals weren’t covered within the first year of coverage (so that was a lie to cover her mistake) I would have thought an office manager and the person who is supposed to verify insurance would check that first thing! I have never had this happen before over 30 years of taking myself and 2 kids to the dentist! So there you have it! Chelsea & Jennifer are great though!

resp.text: So sorry Colleen that there was any issue with your time with us at Bryant dental.  Unfortunately with insurance they always have the disclaimer that it is an estimate and not a guarantee of payment.  As a courtesy we strive to help our patients by handling all the dental billing rather than collecting all payments up front for procedures creating the hassle for the patient to handle all billing to his or her own insurance.  It's a partnership where we rely on what the insurance provides us and what the insurance provides to the patient about their own coverage.  We definitely do our best on our end to try to gather all the information about waiting periods, missing tooth clauses and percentages covered.  We will look into your account and see what happened in your situation.  Once again we apologize you had anything but the best experience with us!

name: Wendy Hambrick
text:
Very clean!!!  Where do I start they are truly a AWESOME TEAM!!  WONDERFUL with a lovely atmosphere. Awesome attitude each of the team, with every client that entered in the door. Like many I’m often nervous but not today thank God. They are Very gentle, and caring. Megan took care of me and she was Fantastic.
My husband said this is the only dentist office that made him feel confident in getting dental care.
Dr. Bentley is Super! We love the plan given and we’re  thankful to be patients. The business part at checkout, information given was great!!! The Hambrick’s are BLESSED and happy. Thanks Bryant Dental❤️

resp.text: Aw thank you so much Wendy for your positive review!  We are SO glad to hear you had a great experience with our team at Bryant dental!  We will pass your kind words on to the team! :)

name: Jeffrey Smith
text: Just returned from having a root canal at the Huntsville office..Terrible experience...assistant didn't introduce herself so I couldn't tell you her name or the dentist because he didn't either (when we were leaving my wife found out it was Dr. Willis)..no tell me what's going on or anything..I passed on info from previous dentist as was told to do but was quickly dismissed with we don't do that..just you need to see a specialist...how about what type of specialist? I informed them that cold water really hurts my teeth and dentist said, "Really nothing I can do about it unless I numb your mouth."  In addition, I told both that it does not feel numb where you put the shots..most dentists would probably give you another shot to help..not this one (wasn't even offered anesthesia)...of course they sprayed cold water in my mouth and I jumped you may need to know...dentist says I can't do anything if you jump to which I replied "That is why I told you prior to starting about what you may need to know!" Sprayed cold water in mouth and it sprayed all over my face no goggles and never wiped off my face.  Dentist went back and forth with me on why I was telling him anything about cold water or numbness..after getting through it there was no what to do if I experience pain afterwards, wife had to go back in and ask.  I found the dentist and assistant very rude and unprofessional.

resp.text: So sorry to hear you didn't have a great experience with us Jeffrey!  This definitely doesn't sound like the experience we want for any of our patients or that we typically have as our normal feedback.  I will reach out to the office manager and she will contact you.  We always want to create a wonderful experience for all our patients and will look into this complaint.

name: Phoebe Sulistio (Syl)
text: The service was fast and pleasant, sanitized everywhere, and Megan was very informative about how best to take care of my teeth post-cleaning! Scheduled to come back in 6 months, and I am assured that I will be in good hands.

resp.text: Thank you Phoebe for the great review!  Megan is awesome and we appreciate the positive feedback!  We will pass this on to her :)

name: Off Lymytz fletcher
text: Megan was great And very thorough would  Recommend in her toanyone!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review!  We will pass this on to Megan!  She rocks!

text: This was my first visit to this location and I absolutely loved it! In my 24 years of living, I’ve never had an experience as great as this one. This was the best experience I’ve ever had with ANY dental office and I’m not just exaggerating. Painless and fast but efficient and high quality cleaning. On top of that, everyone was very friendly and helpful. Highly recommend.

text: I had a great experience yesterday at my first appointment with Dr. Bentley and Megan. Megan gave me so much advice to improve the health of my gums and teeth. Megan was very hospitable and knowledgeable and she educated me on the simple things I could do to prevent any degradation of gum or teeth health. Thank you so much!

resp.text: So glad to hear you had a great experience with us and with Megan!  We appreciate the wonderful review and I will pass this along to Megan!  :)

resp.text: Hi Jacqueline!  So glad to hear you had a great experience with us and our team!  We will pass the good review on to them!  Thank you!  :)

Dr. Bentley is also very knowledge and caring. She is definitely the most gentle Dentist I have used. I usually hate going to the dentist because of the discomfort and pain, but I don’t have to worry about that at Bryant Dental! A+

text: I want to brag on my hygienist at Bryant dental Megan Moore an the dentist Dr. Bentley Are amazing they did my cleaning an check up along with my 4 kids one of my kids is two an they made us all feel so welcome an did an amazing job.. If your looking for a new dentist you can take your hole family too this is the one .. we love this place .. thank you both for such a wonderful experience ..

text: I had my first appointment today since moving to Huntsville.  Had the best cleaning by Megan then I've had in years!  She was thorough, explained each step, gave me great tips and advice.  Dr. Bentley was very friendly and also gave great advice.  It was nice to have a dentist and hygienist who were proactive with my oral health and not just trying to use all of my insurance benefits in one visit! The front office staff was very friendly and helpful also.  Great place.  Highly recommend!!

resp.text: Hi Katie!  So glad you had a great experience with us!  We will pass on this wonderful review on to Megan, Dr. Bentley and staff :)

name: Emily Amason
text: Apparently making the appointment is not confirmation enough that you want an appointment.  Warning, if you don't pick up the phone  to confirm your appointment they will cancel it!  Even though you made the appointment!  Absolutely frustrating.  I will be looking for another dentist for the entire family after showing up to appointments they cancelled for my two children because I was unable to take their call to confirm the appointment, even though I MADE the appointment!

resp.text: We are very sorry to hear this Emily.  Due to six month checkups being made so far in advance, we have several communication protocols in place to confirm appointments through text, email and by phone to try to avoid this from ever happening.  We will have management personally reach out to you and try to get issues resolved our end.  We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced and will work to make sure it never happens again.

name: Susan W
text: I called this office because I just moved here, and I had many questions about insurance and about the doctor and I had the pleasure of talking to the nicest young man on the phone. I believe his name was Preston. I’ve never in my 46 years spoken to someone on the phone and felt like we knew each other. He was so polite and made me feel more at ease with coming to the dentist. I’ve always been scared of the dentist. He helped me so much and answered my questions. I never make reviews but I told my daughter how nice he was and she’s going to make an appointment too. I can’t wait to come in and meet everyone. I have always had bad experiences with people on the phone because I have been told I like to talk and ask a lot of questions but he never got frustrated with me. People like him are what brings joy to people like me. :-)

name: Frank Wagner
text: Found Bryant Dental on Cigna’s in network provider list. Called them to make sure they were a Cigna in network provider and they said they were. Stopped in the office and asked again if they were in network for Cigna and after they said they were, I made cleaning and exam appointments for my wife and I. During the appointment day, I presented my Cigna card. Cleaning and Exam were done appropriately. Now Bryant Dental is trying to bill me, because they are not in network for my Cigna plan. Cigna did pay them for the services, but Bryant wants even more than what a cleaning and exam are. Under Cigna in network plan the cleanings and exam are 100 percent covered. I’ve talked to them about this to no avail.

resp.text: I hate to hear that you had any issue Frank.  A management team member look into your account and reach out to you.

name: Ruthinya Bishop
text: Terrible experience I had a splint ordered since last December and got the first one it was wrong. The second time another was ordered and it was wrong. I had already paid for the splint $335. The doctor stated he needed to order another one at this point its terrible because my mouth and face were in pain. The assistant waited to call the company in turn she was rude and I had to wait to find out when my splint that had been paid for was going to arrive. I explained that it was not right I had to keep waiting on the right splint. The assistant said it was not their fault the company got it wrong but I disagree!!  I asked if I could be reimbursed for the splint the assistant manager stated she couldn't reimburse me. I have been going to Bryant dental for over a year and never had any problems until this splint. I had impressions done on this splint in December before the holidays its going on February and they never got it right! Very unprofessional and doesn't value good patients with longevity. Staff is not professional at all!!!

text: I had the worst experience with this place. They had me come back over and over never once mentioning my balance. When they figured out how much they would be getting from insurance.They stopped being nice and demanded payment. I made a payment to them but that was not enough. It had to be exactly what they wanted or they could not do the work to finish my procedure. I walked away with half of my mouth done. Then they wouldn't give me my xrays so I could get it done someplace else because I had a balance. So much for customer service. Also they called to remind me of an appointment for my daughter like I would bring my daughter there after that.

name: Trae L .
text: What a disturbed person. I went in for a filling for 180 dollars&l walked out without my money or my filling. Angela seems to think her office power spills over into legal power.. She said shes been out of the country so my refund will be at her discretion. l threatend with a lawyer & she laughed at me.Why is returning my money for services unrendered up to Angela? What a shady way to steal from unsuspecting people.. Why is this allowed? Should she be allowed to play around with patients money? She sure is a cold hearted women. Stealing is wrong anyway you look at it but,stealing from a disabled man on a fixed income is sick in the head...This is about the Decatur office.

text: Terrible!!! Went there for a free teeth cleaning that was covered by my insurance. They dental assistant photographed my teeth and measured them.  They told me that they would need to do a 3 phase cleaning which will cost me over $700 with my insurance, I told them NO, I came here for a free cleaning.  I left and they sent me a bill for almost $200 for my supposedly FREE teeth cleaning.  They are some crooks, I wouldn't recommend them to anyone but my worse enemy.

name: Toni Worrell
text: I agree with jade... i am a severe Dentaphobe and called to change dentists after a bad experience with my other dentist.  My first visit was ok, but something seemed off.  I assumed it was my fear, and continued goung. I was told I would need a crown.  I show up terrified and they start working on me with nitrox. He says I don't  need it and after several minites, gives me the nitrox, but does not give it time to work. He then drills pokes and grinds, while I am crying. . They fit the temp crown and say I can pay when they put new crown on. I am then in  PAIN for 3 weeks. I go back in he says he wants to put me on steroids and pain meds, but he may have to do a root canal.  They will check to see how I am and setup another appointment.  NEVER HAPPENED.  got a bill in the mail for my crown that I never got... when I called them, their number listed on bill was disconnected. Can you say, "" you know a good attorney? "

text: This place is top notch! It was recommended to me by a trusted friend after I had the unfortunate event of cracking a molar while on vacation. At my next visit a few days later she was able to fabricate a crown and place it for me within a couple of hours. I didn't even have to leave the office and sat in a massage chair while my crown was being made. The procedure was completely painless, and the experience overall was quite enjoyable.  You can tell that Dr. Lee and her team enjoy what they do and take pride in their work. I would highly recommend them!

name: Don Sterling
text: Exceptional experience as first-time visitor. My path leading to this visit had been a rocky one, and everyone listened to my back-story, made a thorough assessment and got me the straight story. name: Stephanie Miller
text: We love our dentist office  because of their friendly staff, almost no wait time, clean and efficient, nice comfy chairs, and kid and family friendly!

resp.text: Thank you Stephanie!

name: Charles May
text:
I was in Orange Beach on a six week vacation and though l would have my teeth cleaned, so l went to this dentist. A technician cleaned my teeth, the dentist walked in for a cursory review, said fine and walked out. The charge was almost $100 more than my dentist, also, my dentist cleans my teeth, not a technician. We come to Orange Beach for six weeks very year,  but never back to this place.

Your reply to my comments discussed, among other things, COVID-19 virus. I visited you last fall, long before this  COVID-19.  Your fee was not my main concern. The last time a technician cleaned my teeth, l was in the military. I guess things are different in Alabama.

resp.text:
Charles, thank you for the feedback. We are sorry that your appointment was unlike what you are accustomed to. Many years ago, dentists actually did clean every patient’s teeth. Now, in most offices, a teeth cleaning is performed by a trained dental hygienist, while dentists and their assistants perform a wide variety of procedures on each patient in their chair, from fillings and crowns to dental implants and extractions.

Dental hygienists complete schooling to not only be able to perform dental cleanings, but to also spot issues in a patient’s mouth. Hygienists alert the dentist to potential problems that could lead to restoration work down the road. They are also the ones that teach your at-home care, and help you with problem areas that need improving like flossing, how to brush and sharing information about the right products to be using. Hygienists are licensed by the state and are required to complete a certain amount of continuing education every year. Hygienists at OBFD always take more than the required amount of CE hours to benefit our patients.

At Orange Beach Family Dentistry, we pride ourselves on using the most up-to-date training and technology from x-rays that use the least possible radiation, intra oral and extra oral cancer screenings on every patient, and the highest quality instruments and products, all in an environment that is comfortable and inviting. Not to mention, all of the extra precautions we have implemented during the COVID-19 epidemic, such as air purification systems to capture and kill viral particles, UVC lights to kill the virus, extra PPE,  N95 and KN95 masks, and disinfection of every room way above the requirements of OSHA.

However, Dr. Lee has been careful that all of the extra costs associated with COVID 19 have not been pushed onto patients despite the highly inflated prices of PPE and disinfection supplies. If a patient does not have dental insurance, we offer an in-house membership plan which discounts all of our services.

In the case of this review, it sounds like the major concern was the cost and not the quality of care. As you pointed out, you have a dentist in your hometown willing to provide some level of service for a lower rate that you are satisfied with. Thank you for your patronage and we wish you all the best.

name: Ann McFadden
text: I like most hate going to the dentist,but  Orange Beach Family Dentist made my visit very comfortable.  I have been back several times and every visit has been just fine.

From the soothing decor of the front office, to the high tech dental equipment, to the TV I could watch while in the chair, I was impressed. My Hygienist Rhea was wonderful and ever conscious of my comfort; Dr. Lauren was thorough when explaining future care concerns. If you're looking for a new dental office, look no further!

text: I went in for first time visit to have x-rays and teeth cleaned. After there evaluation , they said I needed a deep cleaning. When I returned the RUDE office manager said "since you did not respect our opinion we no loner want you as a patient, find you another dentist." So I did !!  The other dentist said we see no problems other than you went 2 years without a cleaning, It is going to take 2 visit. They did the 1st cleaning that same day and performed the other today. 2 hours after I was kicked out of "OBFD" my tarter was removed and now 2 weeks later my teeth have been completely cleaned and polished. Elenar

name: Amanda Bussey
text: The office is very updated and so nice. Dr Lee and her staff are skilled and extremely professional! Had a great experience and will definitely use in the future again.

name: Frankie Bowen
text:
I had 3 fillings filled. After around 30 days they all fell out. I tried reaching the office for 2 days and the phone was forwarded to another number. Nobody called me back. On the 3rd day somebody finally answered the phone. The unfriendly receptionist on the other end said they would only be open until noon and the office would be closed until jan 2 for 2 weeks for the holidays. They could let dentist take a look then. I told her I couldnt wait that long and didnt want to get an infection. She reluctantly let me come in. I went in and the dentist redid my fillings. Upon leaving receptionist said there would be a $75 office visit fee. I had paid $800.00 previously for the failed dental work. I told her I didnt feel like I owed her any more money. She insisted I pay it and furthermore said she could have charged me again to rebuild the teeth. Personally I would fire any body who spoke to my clients that way. She should be terminated. The dentist seems kind enough but I question the quality of her work and definitely think she should get some new employees for her office that return phone calls and treat customers with kindness and respect. I will not be returning to orange beach family dentistry!

RESPONSE TO YOUR REPLY TO MY REVIEW....
Obviously you are not the owner of Orange Beach Family dentistry as you refer to the dentist in the 3rd person. Yet another lie. You are the same flunky receptionist who was rude from the start and continues to be online. As for the original good review I left I have an explanation for. Since you used a ridiculous analogy to explain your rudeness and incompetence I will also reply with an analogy so maybe it will be easier for you to understand.

Imagine you go on a first date with someone and you think it went pretty well. Then you go on a second date and find out what a liar and cheater she really is. You then wish that the first date never happened. That's a lot like the reasoning for my first review. I have no dislike for Lauren the dentist, everybody makes mistakes. But you should own up to them and stand behind your work. I do hold her responsible for letting you handle her business and respond to her google reviews. It's definitely a mistake and I'm sure In time you will be terminated because your smart mouth is bad for business! Furthermore letting dogs run loose in your office and letting them lick peoples hands while they are in the dentist chair is unsanitary and just plain stupid, not to mention a health code violation.

resp.text:
Frankie, Thank you for taking the time to voice your opinion again after the positive review you left us in the past. Because of privacy regulations, we can’t discuss any specifics about your comments. However, we are committed to providing you the highest quality care, and we take your feedback very seriously.
At Orange Beach Family Dentistry, we pride ourselves on answering and returning patient phone calls in a timely and courteous manner. When the office is closed, an employee always has an "on call" phone and calls are returned immediately. All of the roadwork on Canal Road has caused Mediacom to go out occasionally and the phone lines go down for brief periods. However, it is rare that this happens.
Dr. Lauren Lee takes great pride in using the highest quality products & techniques when treating patients. Every case is unique with its own set of circumstances. Not every patient agrees to ideal treatment, which sometimes means a not ideal outcome.

If your car tire has a hole and the recommended solution is to get a new tire but you decide to patch it instead...will you be surprised if it keeps going flat? You can use all of your money to keep patching your tire over and over, or you can spend more money for the ideal solution of getting a brand new tire.
And if you go to a car repair shop and get a tire patched up, will it not cost the shop money for materials used? How much does it cost the shop to add new air and new materials? Some customers may get their car fixed but threaten to write a bad review so that they don't have to pay for the service they received. Other customers are rude to the employees of the car shop, & the employees would like to charge the customer triple the amount, but instead they smile & give 5-Star customer service.

name: Liz Rohman
text: Dr. Lee and her entire staff are the best.

resp.text: Thank you Liz.

name: Ronald Crumbley

text: I am a new patient at Orange Beach Family Dentistry, and my first visit went so smoothly that I had to write a review. From the minute I walked in the door, I felt welcomed. My wait time was less than 2-3 minutes. Every detail in the office met or exceeded my expectations, including cold water in the waiting area, TV's in every work room, and all new, modern equipment. The receptionists were very nice and helpful, and the hygienists were great, as was Dr. Lee. They offer an annual dental plan for $299 which covers bi-annual cleaning, x-rays, and provides discounts off the list prices for various services. I cannot recommend this business highly enough if you are looking for a family dentist in OBA.

Unfortunately, they charged my insurance $350.00+ for this one simple 15 minute procedure 😐. Over-charging insurance companies is the number one reason for high rates. Won't be going back.

resp.text: Hello Chris.  We are sorry that you are disappointed in our billing practices.  Just so you know, Dental Insurance works much differently than Medical Insurance.  What we "charged" your Dental Insurance makes no difference as the Insurance company sets the fees, not us.  We could have "charged" $1000 for the work you had done, and we would have been paid the same and written off a higher amount.  In fact, we typically have to write off ~33% of everything we do.  Most dental insurances companies haven't changed their fees in 5+ years, and we haven't raised our fees in the same time frame.  If you have any further questions in how Dental Insurance works, please feel free to give us a call.

text:
I had a very, very bad experience here. Cindy did my cleaning, if you can call it that (bloodbath might be more accurate). The pick kept slipping and gouging my gums and it was extremely painful. According to her, my previous dental hygienists didn't do a thing to remove the plaque from my teeth because she announced that my mouth was in terrible shape, and didn't I know that I was supposed to brush my teeth regularly? When she started in on flossing and waggled her blood-stained fingers in front of my eyes, I got dizzy and started crying.

Dr. Peters came in next and said, "I hear you've been having some trouble! Did you know you're supposed to brush and floss your teeth? You have to be good about it, or else your teeth will end up looking like this..." at which point he gestured to a horrifying picture mounted on the wall featuring blackened and rotting teeth. He told me that my teeth shouldn't be so bad for someone my age and the cleaning shouldn't be so painful unless I haven't been taking care of them. People, I have been seeing dentists twice a year throughout my entire life, keeping up with my regular cleanings and x-rays, and no dentist has ever been this critical of me. I think Cindy was rough and careless, and defended herself against my crying by saying that I had terrible and highly sensitive teeth, and Dr. Peters took her at her word instead of asking her to leave the room and talking to me alone.

Between the condescension from both of them and the heavy-handed pick wielding, I will never ever recommend this practice, nor will I ever return there.

resp.text: Minehwa, we're sorry you feel like you received sub-optimal care at our office.  We can assure you, however, that every patient receives a thorough cleaning.  We accept nothing less.  We cannot comment on your situation due to HIPAA regulations.  As a general point of information, some patients acquire calculus buildup more easily and quickly than others due to factors both within their control and outside of their control.  For that reason, not all patients receive cleanings every six months although most do.  A small amount of patients require cleanings yearly while others require them every 3-4 months.  Again, we are sorry that you feel that you didn't receive the care you deserve, and if you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to call our office.

name: Pete Pappelis
text:
The dentist that I had been seeing for almost fourteen years unfortunately retired so I have been trying to find a replacement. I recently cracked a tooth, and I was referred to a local dentist, so I decided to give them a try. Folks, just because someone has a fancy office does not mean that they are a reputable business, at least in my experience. It is not typical of me bad mouthing a local business and I will keep their name out of this review, but they are an embarrassment to the noble profession of dentistry. When I was seen by the hygienist, she responded, "Oh wow that is bad, you will need to have that tooth extracted immediately". My initial thought was "I didn't realize that a hygienist was also a doctor of dentistry". Then when the dental assistant took the x-rays, her response was identical! What made matters worse the doctor backed up what they said and wanted to extract the tooth right there and then!!! I was concerned and confused so I asked what the cost would be. They brought in the "closer" with the three options. Just yank it, yank it and create a cap with a bridge like a denture or the option that I would probably have chosen, yank it and have an implant which would have cost over three thousand dollars, oh, by the way they have a company that will finance.
Thanks, but no thanks!
So, I walked out and I waited, maybe too long because I got a bad abscess. Now what do I do?
I researched and talked to many folks. I decided to give Southern dentistry a try and thank God I did. They got me in the next morning. Everyone that I came in contact with was very professional and friendly. From the receptionist to the dentist. The dental assistant took the x-ray and told me that the doctor will be with me shortly. Most of my experiences with doctors or dentists are that if you have an appointment be prepared to wait an hour or two before someone sees you. I was seen within a few minutes. Dr. Jessica Robinson was great, very professional and to the point and explained everything in detail. She recommended against extracting the tooth. She believed that the tooth can be saved. Her recommendation was to perform a root canal with a crown at a cost of less than a third of what the other dentist recommended! Very short and to the point treatment plan. NO FINANCING NEEDED!
How refreshing and what a great place. For once a dentist that understands CUSTOMER SERVICE! I highly recommend Southern dentistry. You will not be disappointed.
RAVING FAN

resp.text: Thank you
