name: Holly Morse
text: I see Dr. Knight for botox as well as annual teeth cleanings. I can’t speak highly enough about him in both regards. I’ve seen a handful of other doctors for fillers and such, but none compare to how thorough Dr. Knight is. He actually sits and talks to you about the areas you’d like done, takes pictures, marks the areas, and takes his time. Also, he has the best office staff on the eastern shore! Everyone is always so kind and makes you feel at ease.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words!

name: Lynn Lister
text: Out of all the dentist I've seen throughout my and my children's lives,  they are the best,  sweetest,  kindest most caring dental office period.  They make me feel welcome,  comfortable and calm from the moment I walk in the door till the moment I walk out the door.  They know you by name which makes you feel like they truly care about you as a person and not just another dollar sign or number walking through their doors.  Thanks to Dr.  Knight and his wonderful staff I can smile again without covering my mouth or feeling embarrassed.  I feel beautiful again.  Thank you so much for all you've done and all you may do in the future. Sincerely,  Alice Lister

name: Rachel Elrod
text: Great service! We love bringing our Family here 💚

resp.text:
Thank you so much for your kind words, Rachel. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us.

Cheers,

Fairhope Modern Dental

name: Nancy Wininger
text: I been going to that same location with different Dentists for 20 years and by far this is the best experience I have had. I do feel Dr. Knight offers the most professional and up to date procedures. The office is clean, bright and comfortable. All of the staff are so helpful and friendly that it makes me feel like I'm just part of the family. If something is amiss I feel most confident it will be more than taken care of in a professional and caring manner. I have and will continue to recommend Dr Knight.

name: Larry Hunter
text: Great staff!   I have enjoyed coming to Fairhope Modern Dental.  Their staff is always easy to work with and they clean my teeth very thoroughly.  Nice clean office.  They do not over book their appointments, so my wait time is very minimal.

name: Lauren Lavender
text: Dr. Knight and his staff truly go above and beyond for their patients! I have never felt so truly taken care of and genuinely cared for, like I have at Fairhope Modern Dental (and all after only my second visit). I look forward to continuing my dental care at this wonderful office and I would highly recommend Dr. Knight and his staff for your Dental needs!

name: Virginia Ewing
text: WOW!!! Who knew going to the dentist could be a pleasant experience. Went in with a broken tooth, 2.5 hrs later I'm leaving with a beautiful in office made crown. A+++ highly recommend. Super friendly staff as well.

name: Frederick Smith
text:
Because I tend to be a perfectionist, I rarely leave reviews. I feel it’s a bit unfair of me to expect establishments to consistently perform at a higher than average level. I’m not embarrassed to say, I have fired a few dentists over the years for many different reasons. All deserved, but I never publicly  reviewed or announced other than to the doctor my reasons for discontent.

I was in the slow process (1 year) of finding a new dentist. Over the last two weeks I started to have some sporadic pain. Since, I drove by Modern Dental in Fairhope everyday, I decided to read their reviews. I was intrigued, and wanted to see what a 100 person 5 star office felt and looked like.
So, after my visit, here I am giving 5 stars. Because honestly, I could not find fault with this practice. From the front to the back (especially Dr. Knight) this office strives to perform their jobs at a very high level.
Fred

name: Lynne Cary
text:
I love going to Dr.Knight and his staff. State of the art equipment,upbeat atmosphere.
He never hurts me and actually listens to me. We have a long term plan.
I tried the zoom whitening today and it works! So give them try if you are new in town.

name: Barbara Collinsworth
text: I am a very nervous patient today I had a crown procedure.  Ashleigh along with Dr. Knight and the entire staff made me feel brave and relaxed.  I recommend this practice to anyone who is like me and has a fear of dental work.  Thank you to everyone at Fairhope Modern Dental😎

name: Heather Johnson
text: I switched to Dr. Knight from a large dental group and I’m so happy that I did! From the front desk staff to the medical staff, everyone was so professional and welcoming. Dr. Knight took his time to hear my concerns. I felt very comfortable.

name: Claudia Hage- Wright
text: Our whole family loves to go to see Dr. Knight and the staff at Fairhope Modern Dental. Everyone is so sweet and will take time to listen to any questions or concerns and answers in a easy to understand way! We never experienced issues with waiting times either, you get seen at the time of your appointment or early. The location is easy to access and the facilities are always clean, bright and inviting. Very child friendly too!!!

name: Ashley Adams
text: Highly recommend! Outstanding experience! Staff is friendly and welcoming. My teeth have never been this clean and white after a cleaning. Everything was above and beyond.

name: Mills Family
text: Outstanding experience with personable staff and a knowledgeable Doctor! Dr. Knight’s pleasant, conversant nature put me at ease before and during a procedure. I highly recommend his practice!

name: Mallorie Sain
text: Everyone from the technicians to the front desk to the doctor are extremely knowledgeable and friendly. I would recommend this establishment to anyone looking for their next dental health home. The dentist is not anyone’s favorite place to go, however this office makes the experience enjoyable. Top notch quality, people and equipment.

name: Rose D'Angelo
text: The Doctor & Staff were very informative as to the necessary procedures that I need to have done! They are a very friendly group & accommodating!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Rose!

name: Jennifer Davis
text: Had a broken tooth that needed to be removed.  It's a 15 min. drive to his office from my house. Appointment was @ 9am; I was home by 10am; WITHOUT ANY pain:) NONE!!! I am BEYOND grateful; & cannot recommend him & his AWESOME staff enough:)

name: Anna Hardy
text: Since my daughter has been old enough to see a dentist, we have been going here. The dentists have changed, but the service has not. The hygienists are personable, knowledgeable, and friendly. The dentist is professional and up to date. My daughter has never been nervous or scared. She looks forward to going. A picture she drew for her hygienist several years ago still hangs in the office, and she makes sure to point it out every time we come. These are wonderful people.

name: Christopher Rowe Sr
text: I had a very good experience with my procedure today. Liv was great and my periodontal work although not completely pain free was acceptable and done with professionalism. Thank you!

name: Jane Libbey
text:
Dr. Knight is a committed dentist - His diagnosis, corrections of the problem,
and follow-up are exactly what I'd expect.
The Office Staff and Technicians are wonderful - Very composed, knowledgeable and personable.

resp.text: Thank you, Jane!

name: Joseph Gray
text: I went at the beginning of the year to get a crown done. The original dentist, before new ownership, was lacking. Under the new dentist I was able to get a new crown fabricated the same day that they mapped it. It was even better to boot that they are willing to offer payment plans and the staff was very kind. I look forward to future visits. My kids really feel comfortable going here as well. I really feel 5 stars is a fair review of this practice under the current staff.

name: Madison Scharles
text: No one really likes going to the dentist but Dr. Knight and all of the staff make it really an enjoyable experience. They assess and fix problems and are very flexiable. They have up-to-date equipment. The staff is very high quality, efficient and ready to help when in need. Great patient care!

name: Michelle Gafford
text: After moving to Fairhope one year go, I needed to find a new dentist. Finding new physicians of any kind can be stressful and going to the dentist alone is stressful enough. I took a leap of faith and chose Fairhope Modern Dental. They were great during my first visit but I needed more experience with them to know if I was really going to like them. Today was my second cleaning visit and I can say with the utmost confidence that I would wholeheartedly recommend them to anyone looking for a new dentist. They are incredibly friendly, professional,  and thorough from the time you walk in the door until the time you leave. They do not rush you in and out, but rather offer plenty of time to discuss any issues or questions you may have. So, if you are searching for a dentist, give them a call. I'm thankful that they were the right choice for me.

name: Erin Wright
text: I commuted back & forth to my old dentist when I relocated to Baldwin County because I couldn't find a dentist here that I liked. I finally gave Fairhope Modern Dental a try, and I'm so glad I did! Dr. Knight & his staff are extremely knowledgeable, welcoming, & personable! I honestly couldn't ask for better!

name: Gretchen Jones
text: Such a great experience! I’ve always had anxiety when going to the dentist but I felt very comfortable at Fairhope Modern Dental! The staff and Dr. Knight were all very nice and made me feel such at ease. Happy to say this is my family’s new dentist!!

name: C Darby Ulery
text: The whole office team is friendly, courteous, and always makes me feel like a priority!

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Celina Cormier
text: i Would like to thank Dr. Knight for making me feel comfortable about a misunderstanding. It really showed me that he truly does care about his patients and I am looking forward to him taking care of me in the future. He is the most caring and compassionate Dr. around.

name: Elizabeth Battaglia
text: My whole family ( 6 of us) have Modern Dental as our family dentist. From front office to the exam chair, we are treated friendly and professionally . I feel we can ask questions and not be rushed about our dental care. They listen and care about our dental needs. We drive 45 from where we live and it is worth the drive.

name: Deborah Barry
text: I always have a great experience at Fairhope Modern Dental! My hygienist April was awesome!!! My family use Fairhope Modern Dental as well. I recommend them all the time.

name: Trista Yeend
text: Dr. Knight and his staff go above and beyond in providing great care and service to their patients. I appreciate the compassion they displayed and everything they did to keep me comfortable during a difficult time.

name: James Moody
text: Excellent dental care!!!

name: Ange Combs
text: Both I and my son use Fairhope Modern Dental. The staff is very friendly and personable. I feel comfortable and confident in the care that we have both received.

name: Jo Ann Moore
text: I have dental phobia. I was very upset when I learned my lady dentist and hygienist was not here anymore. Shelby is my hygienist and Dr Knight is awesome.  Just had my first filling he did and I am very happy with his way of making you feel comfortable. I recommend Dr Knight and his staff.

name: Carolyn Patterson
text: I have had a very positive experience with Dr. Knight and his staff. They are caring and professional. I would highly recommended this office.

name: BarbLiz WhaJor
text: We really liked the dentist who was here before so the switch was challenging. Dr. Knight won us over though. I think the Modern in the name is true. Dr. Knight has invested in creating a high quality dental practice. We both like him lots. He doesn’t start off with the most invasive or expensive procedure, either. It’s clear that he is part of your team, you’re in charge! Plus - staff is great, my hygienist is SO good!

name: Sarah Flanagan
text: They were all so kind and helpful. Very professional and clean environment! Everyone welcomed me and greeted me with a smile. It was my first time to ever come to this dentist and they gave me a new patient gift and my hygienist walked me through everything she was doing to make sure I was comfortable! When I met Dr. Knight, he had a really laid back demeanor and was easy to talk to. He made sure I understood what was needed from me at home to help improve my dental hygien and never made me feel stupid for asking questions or not knowing something! I highly recommend Fairhope Modern Dental!!

name: Veronica Kramer
text: I couldn't say enough praise about Fairhope Modern Dental and Dr. Knight. The office staff are all so friendly and the office itself is clean, welcoming and such a nice environment. Dr. Knight and his staff got me in with such short notice to fix a broken tooth before I left on a vacation for a week and after my experience there that day I switched and am now using them for all of my dental work. I would highly recommend them. If their friendly environment and personalities weren't enough their extremely fair pricing would have made me want to change as well.

name: Tabitha Miller
text: The people that work there are very nice. They check on you even after your appointment. Makes you feel like they really care. Will always be the place i go

name: Catherine Mann
text: I was able to get in immediately and was treated kindly and with respect. Staff was friendly and knowledgeable. They were able to manage my pain effectively.  I would recommend this office to anyone looking for a dentist.

name: Melissa Kummer
text: From the very first visit I have been nothing pleased. Wonderful, very friendly, accommodating staff!! Dr. Knight is very nice and personable. I would HIGHLY recommend them to anyone looking for a dentist  Top notch practice!!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: David Impastato
text: One of the most amazing dentist experiences I ever had. Was scared of the Dentist since i was a kid ,but Dr.knight made sure i was comfortable and relaxed.Shelby also did a amazing job at cleaning my teeth,making sure i was comfortable the whole time. 5 stars hand down

resp.text: Thanks, David!

name: Billie Kearney
text:
Great experience, Dr. Knight explains procedures in a way that you can understand. He has a wonderful staff, from the office to the dental hygienist.
I would recommend Fairhope Modern Dental , I’ve always had a wonderful, painless experience there.

name: Daniel Huckleberry
text: A really happy staff providing professional service. Great appoint reminders keep me on track. Thanks Fairhope Modern Dental for a pleasant experience time after time!

I will keep coming here because of how honest he is with me about my treatment. I love that he has a discussion with me, explains why and how a procedure is done.  He doesn't leave you in the dark about your own health... His staff is friendly and approachable too.  So glad Dr. Knight is our family dentist now!

resp.text: Thank you so much!!!!

His staff is highly efficient, professional and courteous at all times.  I am very happy with the care I receive at Fairhope Modern Dental and recommend this practice without reservation.

resp.text: Thank you!

Fairhope Modern Dental

text: We just moved to the area from Coastal NC and have been so impressed by Dr. Knight and his staff.  They have been quite accommodating, professional, and competant! I highly recommend them as a dentist.

text: I must say that I am not one for going to the dentist; however, this was an extremely relaxing experience.  If you are need of a dentist, I would highly recommend this office and team.  Easy to get to, and they are so polite.  From the front desk to the doctor, everyone wants to help.

name: Diana Martin
text: Everyone here is so friendly! I actually enjoy going to the dentist because it’s such a nice experience! Great dentist and staff!

resp.text: Thank you! We love when your sweet family comes in.

name: Shanna Seay

text: Dr. Knight and staff are friendly and thorough in explaining what care is given to my family. My children and wife feel comfortable there, and that means everything to me.

Without question Dr. Ashley is the best of the best.  I have experienced the highest quality and professionalism with her and the entire staff.

Thank you!
John J. Hewitt

resp.text: Thank you, Mr. John! It is patients like you that make our job so enjoyable. We love having you and your wife as part of our dental family.

name: Rick Speight
text: Convenient, professional and friendly. What more is there? I recommend FMD to all.

name: karen plantz
text: I would not recommend Dr. Knight. I went in to have a crown replaced. The crown wasn't causing me any trouble, It was an older crown and Dr. Knight recommended replacing it with a new crown.  While the temporary crown was on I complained to Dr. Knight that the temporary crown was causing me a great deal of pain.  He said that he had to drill very deep because there was a lot of decay and that he was not surprised that I was experiencing pain. Ridiculous. I am still in a great deal of pain but will not return to him. I have also had bad headaches since the procedure. I went to my MD and she said that the dental work done (upper left second molar) most likely is  causing my headaches. I would not recommend Dr. Knight.

resp.text: We are so sorry to hear that your experience was not great. We do take that seriously and would love the opportunity to make you happy.

name: jason okinawa
text: My past experience at this office was one of the most painful and traumatic of my life, so much so I vowed never to go back.  Unfortunately my teeth weren't able to keep up their end of the deal.  New dentist, much different experience.  Absolutely no pain!  I hope I never have to go back but if/when I do, I am confident it will be equally as pleasant as today.  Thanks

resp.text: This makes us happy, Jason.  Thank you!

name: Lisa Eaton
text:
Truly amazing practice!
Very knowledgeable personable and friendly staff!
Dr. Knight is an awesome Dentist!!

text: I’ve had debilitating anxiety surrounding dental visits for years. Said fears prevented me from even routine cleanings- though I take responsibility. This positive experience has completely lifted such fears and I’m proud to say I’ve already scheduled follow up appointments with no residual anxiety. Everyone was friendly, informative and personable. I had a deeply decayed tooth extracted and the dentist not only informed of all options but was kind and nonjudgmental throughout the process! The best part is that a variety of services are offered here keeping patients from having to go to several offices for cosmetics, routine and other.

resp.text: Reviews like this make our day.  It was great meeting you, Ellen!

name: Keith & Suzanne Douglas
text:
Very Disappointed With Staff At Fairhope Modern Dental.
Last Time We Were In Office Prior To Our Insurance
Kicking In September 2018.
I Asked If We Needed To Call And Make Our Appointment And They Insisted They Would Contact Us For Our Appointment Upcoming For September 2018.
So We Patiently Waited To Hear Back From Them As They Advised Us.
And While I Carefully Considered Our Dental Needs. We Never Heard From Them In September 2018.
So We Promptly Decided To Change Dentist.
Because They Didn’t Contact Us Until Late January 2019.
And Acted As If It Was Our Neglect To Not Following Up With Them. Some Of The Staff Is A Bit Rude Too.
But I Have A Lot  Of Patience Until It Runs Out.
So When Hygienist Called For My Husband To Make Him An Appointment It Was Way Too Late For My Satisfaction.
It Being Late January 2019.
She Didn’t Even Mention My Appointment Whatsoever.  I Genuinely Feel They Owe Us Some Type Of Apology For Not Contacting Us For Our Appointments As They Insisted They Would Do For Our Next Appointments Needed Upcoming In September 2018.
So I Informed Her We Changed Dentist.
Our New Dentist Is Closer Too.
I Will Not Recommended Them To Any One. We
Totally Have Never Been Completely Satisfied With Fairhope Modern Dental.
I Sure Miss Fairhope Smiles With Dr. Ashley Wassermann & Her Staff.
Obviously Things Did Not Stay The Same Upon Her Leaving Fairhope Smiles.

name: Jason Odom
text: Nothing but smiles! My daughter and I had come in the other day and booked a last minute appointment before she left for college, and Fairhope Smiles could not have been more accommodating. If you chose Fairhope Smiles you will be met with a clean facility and a welcoming environment. The nurses are very thoughtful and Dr. Wasserman was great. She gave us an excellent recommendation for my daughter to have her wisdom teeth removed. Overall, great experience.

name: Lynn Vanzandt
text: The Dental  practice at Wall Street  Dentistry is the best I have ever received Dental  care from.  Flor, Krista, and Dr. Renfro are the absolute best.   Every business around should learn how to treat people from Wall Street  Dental.  Best of the best.

name: Carrington Bowman
text: This is the worst dentist I’ve ever been to in my life they are so unprofessional and rude. I will never go here again. They told me a fill in would be 81$ come to find out they charged me 247$ for an examine I never asked for. And I couldn’t do anything about it because it was already done thanks for not telling me the prices for everything also what I didn’t ask for. I don’t have insurance because I can’t afford it and you guys demand I pay money for something I didn’t ask for? Also you told me on the phone the fill in would be 81$ you never told me I had to have a examine that was 81$ and the fill in would be 247$ You guys are a joke I would leave no stars if I could. Make sure everyone that goes here watches out for this. This place is a j-o-k-e!

text: Great service ,very professional no time wasted.

text: I absolutely LOVE everyone here. Very welcoming place! They go out of their way just to make sure their patients are cared for, comfortable and satisfied. name: Nick Baker
text: I have been a patient of Wall Street Dentistry for over 4 years. I always have a crazy schedule and they are willing to work with it. The ladies upfront are so kind. text: The best of the best!  Everyone at Wall Street Dentistry is kind and really caring. They all work together to make sure you have the best dental work possible at reasonable prices.  They make going to the dentist enjoyable. I look forward to seeing my hygienist Haley Wilson and Dr Conley too.

name: Lili
text: This dentistry will always be the cleanest, kindest, and the most caring visitation I have ever gone too. The staff is always on board and ready to help! No matter how big or small the situation is, they’ll always think best about the patient! The Doctors are honest and helpful through out the check up and will recommend the best solutions to a problem. The cleanings are also worth note that they are painless and efficient, so there is no worries about being poked in a wrong area. All in all the dentistry is very much worth it!

text: I have been going to Wall Street Dentistry for years now and I absolutely love it here. The staff is always to kind and everyone greets you as soon as you walk in. Definitely the best dentistry around town!

text: This place is amazing. Girls upfront are always friendly and welcoming. The staff is knowledgeable and willing to work with your schedule. I would recommend this dentist office to everyone.

text: The office is very clean and the staff is very friendly. Haley Wilson, a hygienist there was by far the best I’ve ever had. She was very professional and nice. She cleaned my teeth very good as well.

text: Thank you Flor for recommending this place! Dr. Renfroe is awesome and always does a great job & so do all of his assistants!  All the staff there is always very helpful and friendly! I love Wall Street!

name: Krista Henson
text: I love Wall Street Dentistry! ❤️ Dr. Renfroe helped make my smile beautiful with orthodontics and Dr. Conley restored some teeth with fillings and a perfect crown with zero complications! I feel at home when I am at the office. Highly recommend!

name: Missy Prince
text: How many people can say they enjoy going to the dentist?  I can.  Not just because I know I am receiving the best care but also because I feel as though everyone there is really invested in making each patient feel calm and comfortable.  Love Dr. Conley and Dr. Renfroe.  <3

name: Casey Talton
text: I fell asleep during my root canal! Amazing dentists and dental assistants. Thank you, Diana for keeping me comfortable and the conversation. I love this place.

text:
We love Wall Street Dentistry! We followed our dental hygienist when she went to work here and now even my extended family uses them!
Great people! Great Place!

name: Angela Faulkner
text: Awesome dental office the whole staff is amazing, Front desk girls are always so nice and helpful, and Dr. Conley is amazing and does wonderful work! He is always asking about my girls and how they are doing he is never in a rush with me or my girls and his work is amazing.

name: Jan Johnson
text: The staff at Wall Street is excellent. They are very supportive of their clients with a fear of having procedures done.  I recommend them highly.

name: Matthew Thomas
text: I have had many great experiences at Wall Street dentistry. Dr. Renfroe, Dr. Conley, and the staff are all professional and attentive. They have taken care of my family for years and we always look forward to our next visit.

name: Hannah Buckelew
text: I love my dentist, everyone is so wonderful and nice. I would recommend Wall Street Denistry to anyone!! They take care of all your needs and wants.. and I’m partial my Aunt Jodie works there!! Shout out to her! ❤️!!

name: Pablo Hernandez
text: Very pleased with their service. The atmosphere is warm and inviting and they have great dental assistants. Very professional. Very clean.

name: Rebecca Masdon
text: Wow! What a great dental practice! Two years ago, I moved to this town and hadn’t been to see a dentist in over 10 years! My mouth was in bad shape and I was very nervous to walk in, and from the moment I walked in to Wall Street, I felt like family! Debra welcomes me in and I barely had to wait! Next, Lizzy and the rest of the dental assistants greeted me and sat me down in a way tht I felt like I had just made new friends! When Dr Renfroe came in to visit me, I knew the way he communicated with me about my dental health and what my next steps were, I knew he would take great care of me, and he totally has! They have transformed my smile and health! Fast forward to now, my dental health is much better and I’m way more proud of my smile! Not only was I so impressed with this dental practice that I have maintained my dental visits, but I also was so inspired by this team that I joined the team and am now currently a dental assistant with Wall Street! Dianna has been training me everything she knows, and has made working here such a pleasure! Talk about great first impressions that last! When I’m here I feel like family ❤️ 🦷

name: Brandy Pounds
text: Great hygenist, Krista! And Dr Conley is a fantastic dentist! If you're looking for a dentist, give him a try.

name: Melissa Cochran
text:
Dr Conley & staff are completely amazing!  I have been terrified of dentist my whole life resulting in not going at all.  I’m thankful my teeth held up pretty good but I have had to have work. My fear no longer exists. They all took in my fears into consideration & have made me totally at ease...getting better with each & every visit!
I could not recommend them more!

name: Mikala Patterson
text: Love this place! Friendly staff that made me feel comfortable!  This will be my go to place from  now for dental care!

text: I went to Cumberland back in 2015 to get fillings and a root canal done. I agree with others, they seem very rushed at everything they do, but I can’t afford for them to keep messing up costing me money. Never again will I go back, good luck to those who do and kudos to those who have had a better experience.

The worst place

name: Melissa Simmons
text: I went in last Saturday to get 4 wisdom tooth removed when I got back in the room for them to proceed to do the procedure I feel it was a rush job and they was just ready to go home dr. Kelly had no bedside manners in my opinion she was just ready to clock out to me I feel as if she was trying to talk me out of it after I paid cash money with no insurance to get it done after about four to five days at home I noticed the back of my teeth had a funny taste with something coming out of them I put a napkin in my mouth to find that it was yellow stuff coming out of it I immediately called the office on a Saturday during business hours no one ever picked up the phone after I got off work I proceeded to call back that night in the answering service picked up and I told her that someone needed to get in contact with me because it was an emergency and what the situation was this was Sunday it is now 4:10 p.m. Monday and no one has still contacted me I went to the emergency room on Sunday night and they told me the antibiotic that I got with the procedure that I had I should not have that antibiotic they put me on more antibiotics of which I had to pay for my ER visit but long story short I wouldn't recommend taking a dog to this place with no one contact you about an emergency that is a red flag!!!!!

text: There is NO better dentist, nor dentist staff, that is better than Dr. Dillard and his staff!! I have been to a lot of dentists in my lifetime and they are at the top of my list !!!

I highly recommend them !

text: Our family has been long term patients of Dr. Dillard and we can't say enough good things about the entire staff!  They're always up to date on new techniques and are very careful to make your visit as pain free as possible.  We wouldn't go anywhere else and we highly recommend Dr. Dillard!

From start to finish this dental office was top notch!  The front staff had smiles on their faces when you walk in.  Then your hygienist comes out to greet you, mine being Shelley.  She sits down in front of you making you feel like you were her family and I love that because it makes you feel as though they truly do care!  Then of course on to the next part of the dentist, WHICH I HATE” Shelley made very pleasant!
After all that the bad news😩!  I have MS so my teeth have a lot of issues and Dr. Dillard was so caring and very sweet and was going to work on a plan to help my teeth!  Great experience 💙😊😊😊

text: I love my dentist and his staff. It’s a clean, friendly environment and they are some of the best at what they do. I will not go anywhere else.

text: We love Dr. Dillard and his entire staff! This is an amazing group of christian people and they provide wonderful care. My family has been coming to Dr. Dillard for over sixteen years. We aren't going anywhere else.

name: Peggy Strauss
text:
Dr. Dillard and his staff are very professional, kind, do excellent work, and will go over and beyond the call of duty to be there when you need them. I had a dental emergency when out of town, called them for advice, they gave me the name and number of a dentist out of town to help me temporarily, then, met me at their clinic as soon as I returned to Birmingham to repair my tooth permanently.
Another time when I had a dental emergency, Dr. Dillard was out of town. What did he do? He actually came back from his trip early to meet me at his clinic after hours on a day they were closed!  He brought his wife to be his dental assistant and he repaired my tooth in order for me not to miss work the next morning!  What else can I say about this awesome doctor and his amazing staff!?! They are the best! I highly recommend them!!!

resp.text: THANK YOU!

I would recommend Dr. Dillard to anyone looking for a dentist in Pelham, Helena , Alabaster and Hoover.

The recommended Advil.
Awesome.
I will not be back. I will find another dentist.

name: Stephanie Andrew
text: Dr. Katie Denney is the worst. She looked at my teeth and saw a million problems that required fillings. Then later when I scheduled appointments to fix my teeth, she told me oh your teeth looks good, looks like we won't have to do a few of these fillings. I felt like she assumed I would not take care of my teeth so she will just try to make money off of me. Dont go here if you don't want a dentist to assume you will have million problems and have you make appointments all to cancel her prejudements. I feel like I wasted so much money getting fillings there. I never had this many problems with my teeth,  never had braces either. Find a dentist that will not con you into getting fillings.

resp.text: After investigating your review , our records indicate that you have not been seen in our office as a patient since 2019- 2020 due to a relocation to Birmingham. I was informed today that Dr. Denney graciously allowed you to shadow her in the office to give you some experience in the dental field and you had asked her to write a letter of recommendation on your behalf . I am very confident that this negative review was written when we were unable to verify for you this letter was submitted. Dr. Denny is a very compassionate and caring person and I as the owner of Balmoral Dental Center will not allow these false accusations to stand unanswered.

name: Tent9601
text: When they recommended a procedure they told me they would contact me with my fees before having the procedure done. Once they gave me a total,  I went ahead and had the work done,  then after the procedure the fee was 5 times more than what they told me. I did let them know what they had quoted me and they said it was a mistake and honored the original fee quoted. Then three months later they sent me a bill with the higher amount.  If someone made a mistake admit to it don't blame the insurance and then wait three months to bill me when you could have just admitted the error the day of the procedure.

resp.text: We are sorry that you have not been completely satisfied with your experience at our office.  We strive everyday for our patients to leave our office in a better way than when they arrived.  As the owner of BDC, I have thoroughly investigated your complaint .  As we have all come to the realization about insurance in general , there are things that will not be covered especially products such as toothpastes, dental rinses, etc.  that have been purchased in our office.  I would love the opportunity to discuss this further if you wish.  Please contact me at our office.

name: Ketti Johnson
text: This is probably the friendliest dental office I've ever been to.  They did not seem rushed but were prompt and friendly smiles all around. I've already recommended them to some of my family and friends.

name: Kari Degrandpre
text: Great experience at Balmoral Dental Center. My hygienist was amazing, gentle and thorough. Very personal care, and relaxing environment (for a dentist)! Definitely recommend Balmoral Dental Center!

name: Brandy Whitehead
text: Dr. Denney was very sweet, and did a great job with job with what I had done but the receptionist/billing lady doesn’t seem to know what she’s doing and was rude.  First, my insurance was filed differently than my previous dentist and my husbands dentist did.  My medical insurance was filed against.  I was quoted that I would pay $35 for the procedure.  The bill was more like $135.  The billing lady called me multiple times about insurance rather than handling it while I was in the office.  I work during the day.  I can’t sit on the phone and wait for someone to figure this out.  I had a procedure done on the  left side of my mouth on a Monday and the following Monday I was scheduled for more work on the right  side.  I experienced some tooth sensitivity after the first procedure which was a normal side effect.  However by Monday (next procedure due), I was still having sensitivity.  I couldn’t have the right side worked on while I still couldn’t chew food on the left side.  I called to reschedule the appointment Monday morning first thing.  I left voicemail never was responded to and finally after 4 calls got the receptionist on the phone.    I was told I would have a $50 fee for canceling the appointment with less than 24 hours notice.  I didn’t cancel the Friday before because I hoped the sensitivity would be gone by my appointment on Monday.  There is no way to cancel a Monday appointment on Saturday or Sunday.  I said go ahead and bill me if that’s your policy.  Then the receptionist without consulting a dentist tried to bully me into coming to the office.  I didn’t want to come in get billed for an office visit for them to look into something that is a normal side effect.  I finally had to say just bill me the $50 and I’ll find another office to fix the other issues to get her off the phone.  There’s no telling what I will end up paying for the first procedure since it wasn’t filed on my insurance correctly.  It is a shame that bad office staff ruins the experience with an excellent dentist.  If I could rate my interactions with the receptionist (who is also the billing person) a zero, that’s what I would rate it.

name: Kerry Pagel
text: I love this place and all the staff. Very professional and kind. I don’t know how it’s possible, but I rarely even feel the shots. She is very gentle. I am very sensitive and deal with a lot of chronic pain. She is very empathetic and makes me as comfortable as possible. 💗

name: Adriane Johnson
text: Dr. Parks and her staff were amazing . I could honestly say this was my BEST dental experience ever. If you do not have a primary dentist office I would recommend you go here you won't be disappointed. .❤️

name: Ruth Jackson-Hobbs
text: I love this office! Everyone I have interacted with here has been so helpful and sweet! Deb up front treats you like she has known you forever and always greets you with a smile! I have a huge fear of going to the dentist and they all ( plus the gas lol) made me feel so comfortable! I had a immediate denture done on top and they look amazing! I could not be happier!

name: Ruth Jackson-Hobbs
text: I love this office! Everyone I have interacted with here has been so helpful and sweet! Deb up front treats you like she has known you forever and always greets you with a smile! I have a huge fear of going to the dentist and they all ( plus the gas lol) made me feel so comfortable! I had a immediate denture done on top and they look amazing! I could not be happier!

name: Tracy Mayfield
text: Dr. Katie Denney is amazing! She is very personable and professional. Everyone in the office was great - very kind, on time, and thorough. She was also great with my teen daughters - they love her! I would recommend Dr. Denney in a heartbeat.

name: Bree Massi
text: I loved it here until their billing department sent me to collections 3 weeks after sending my bill. They claimed I was 90 days past due as their billing starts from the date of service. They didn’t even tell me I owed anything until 2 months after my visit. Great dental care, awful billing department. I would avoid them if you don’t want to be sent to collections for a bill you didn’t even know about.

name: Kevin Kelly
text: What a very pleasant and professional staff. They treat you as if your part of their family. Very caring and kind. I highly recommended them.

name: Shaun West
text:
I couldn't disagree more with the person who said one star. No way! My experience was the complete opposite. I had a dental emergency while in town on business (I'm from DC). Balmoral was the ONLY place that would see me on short notice, after calling 5 different places! I can't tell you how  grateful I am that Balmoral staff took the time to work me in their schedules, which ended up being at the end of the day. They stayed after closing to see to my emergency. The dentist and assistant were fantastic. They addressed my issue in a timely, professional and competent manner. The dentist even went above and beyond that too, seeing that I had to fly home to DC for additional oral surgery. The dentist at Balmoral worked with my oral surgeons here to provide a complete picture of my issue. Honestly, I can't imagine many dentists that are willing to do this.

Overall, Balmoral is great. Friendly staff, competent professionals. Would highly recommend to anyone in the area. I mean, I was an OUTSIDER from DC and they treated me great. I can't imagine how great they'd actually treat a patient in the area.

name: Caitlyn Hoppe
text: Dental work was great and the only reason they deserve even one star. Paid $300 up front in cash for a tooth extraction and they billed our insurance, who was supposed to reimburse us later. Balmoral then billed and harassed us for months, claiming the extraction was not paid for. Finally after we talked to them several times, they agreed it must have been a clerical error, but the bills didn't stop coming. They then gave us a nasty phone call and said we owed them $80 more. We explained the service had already been paid for, and that we had already spoken to someone from Balmoral who told us this must have been a clerical error. The person on the phone told us that if we didn't have a receipt it wasn't their problem and that they would turn us over to collections, all over $80 that we didn't even owe in the first place. The dentist was nice and the work she did was fine, but the billing dept needs to get sorted out because this is ridiculous.  Do NOT recommend.

I would recommend this practice for anyone who is hesitant about pain, anxiety, visual blemishes, denture work, or anything keeping you from thinking that this can be a piece of cake - IT TOALLY WAS! I put it off for 10 months after the last horrible experience and I'm so glad I found the Balmoral crew! 100% professionals at their crafts. Thank you ladies!!!

name: Cydalise Gaines
text: If I could rate BDC a negative ZERO, I would! In my opinion, I just can't understand why after 30 years of dealing with dentists, I have found them to be the biggest cons out of ALL medical profession. After all the back and forth that dreadful morning on 10/31/2018, the bad vibes I felt, the lies I caught the hygienist in as well as the thought of "I have to get back to work, so what the HELL is she doing?", and the dentist that was "REALLY" clueless"; BDC STILL continued to bill my insurance for a cleaning (though I argued with them) that NEVER occurred. I did report this, so it is currently being investigated. If the hygienist and dentist that took care of me that morning really think that what they were doing or 'talking about' was correct, then maybe they need to go back to college. Thankful my insurance company is investigating this and allowed me another cleaning appointment with another dentist next week. I hope the next dentist will prove their scam that my teeth were never cleaned! I really regret that I ignored the initial vibe I felt to stay away from BDC.....lesson learned.

resp.text:
We are very sorry your experience with Balmoral Dental Center was not as you were expecting. All of us take great pride in our prior  training as well as our continued training as hygienists and doctors . An important part of our training consists of informing and getting permission from our patients before dental work is started. By way of x-rays and gum probings, we determine the  oral health of all patients that visit our office. Based on these findings, we then give a written diagnosis and proposed treatment for the patients to sign .
We have great working relationships with our patients as well as the insurance companies due to this protocol.  Again we are very sorry we did not meet your expectations. We try very hard every day to make the patients that visit us leave with better oral health than when they arrived.

name: Nikki Burks
text: Please do not go here, you will be very upset and disappointed. If I could give no stars I would. I have never been to a place that was  unprofessional as this one. The doctor that was working when I went the 1st time is no longer available and they did not even tell me , I had to ask. I made an appointment to get a crown. They said that it was fine. Remember I had previously been to this establishment. I also requested to have a cleaning but was told that I could not get both done at the same time. As soon as I get there I was already upset, they told me that they had to look at my tooth first and than proceed. I was under the impression that I was getting a crown, no one told me this over the phone and I know I needed one because it hurt and I was ready to pay for one. Instead they cleaned by teeth and looked in my mouth and told me what I needed. I let them contact (LHI) because I am in the military and they would cover some of the cost. LHI contacted me and told me they would NOT ALLOW balmoral dental to do any treatment; which should of been a red flag but I still needed my crown and would use different insurance to do it.  They gave me a cleaning and they scheduled me a another date to get a crown. I went to my appointment and I sat waiting for 20 minutes. I would of left because 10 to 15 minutes is enough time to wait and I was going to reschedule. I finally get in the back and I am talking with a entirely different doctor that has not seen me before. She looks on her screen and says you were here last year in March last and I was like no. What happened to my files. Clearly she did not know how to work her own computer because she did not click on the right date which I could see on the screen, than I told her what they did last time and she tells me I didn't talk with her so she does not have a clue what happened. SO I am really upset because there wasno communication between her and the other doctor. Than she explains to me whats going on and I told her that is not what happened and maybe she should communicate better because I was not going to pay for services that she didn't know what she was going to do, and on top of all that failure to tell me that they had to take measurements for my crown.  I asked why didn't they do this the last time. This was my last straw and will never ever go back to deal with this and hope no one has this issue. If the military didn't want to let them do any treatment I should of left.

resp.text:
Balmoral Dental Center takes great pride in working towards great relationships with our patients.  We have three very qualified dentists on staff with over 60 years of experience to diagnose and serve our patients for any dental needs. As we all know communication is vital for any doctor-patient relationship and when this communication breaks down there are unfortunately some unwanted consequences. We tried many times and spent many hours trying to communicate proper treatment and it's proper sequence for this patient.

Balmoral Dental Center has always had a great relationship with Logistics Health Services (LHI) and continues to see many patients from this company each week. Balmoral Dental Center is so proud to support our military. We regret that we were unable to find a solution that the patient and our dental team could agree on but we must offer only solutions that are in the best interest of our patients.

text:
I went to this dentist close when they first opened up.
They really really damaged my mouth.
They said they did 3 fillings but really did four... Not only that but they drilled to far and unfortunately i had to have all of them pulled. I had 3 surgeries trying to correct their mistake before we just had them pulled. i did try to reach out to them but when i called expressing something was wrong the lady in the front wouldnt listen and instead said they would look at it but in a month and said we needed to try and get the others. I had to then switch dentists and since then im terrified to even attempt to get something as small as a filling.

name: Starr Lehner
text:
While I was saying wrong tooth she kept pulling stating she'll get it. I asked why won't it come out. She stated she'll get it.
So she pulled the good tooth and left decayed abcessed tooth beside it.
Wouldn't let me see tooth she pulled.
Had to go to another dentist who very easily pulled decayed tooth. He asked why she pulled wrong tooth.
When partial I've had more than 30 yrs wouldn't fit back I stated maybe because when you pulled tooth the others moved. Oh no that didn't happen. So she grinded on my partial making it for first time ever loose.
Well went back to get partial and they added a metal loop and wrapped it around another decayed tooth. Recently found out (from Dr)acid reflux quickly ruined my teeth. Always was complimented on my teeth and the care I took. So of course it broke off completely.
Of course Signature Smile wants their co-pay money. I sent what I could. Still I suffer. No apology.
Since the ordeal I've dealt with parotid gland pain.
I'm sure because I'm poor and on Medicare (cancer) I just don't meet their standard of a wealthy christian person so it doesn't matter. Wish I could post pictures of my mouth and what I live with because of them.

resp.text:
Starr,

We have tried contacting you directly regarding your review. Our records regarding the visits you mentioned are from 2017 and 2018, and we have documented consents for the treatment you requested. You also have recurring visits for comprehensive care after the treatment was completed, with no complaints or regard for any issues you mentioned in your review. We are happy to discuss this with you further. Our main priority is to give patients high quality care for their dental health and needs. We hope to hear from you soon!

Signature Smile

name: Chris K. Northington
text: I can not say enough good things about Dr. Wilson and his staff at Signature Smile.  They are without a doubt the best Dental practice I have ever been to.  We turned to them to fix my wife's implants/crowns when no-one else in the area could make them look right.  From the moment we walked in the door, we were greeting with compassion and understanding, and assured that they could fix her crowns.  They immediately scheduled an appoint for that same week to do her evaluation.  In that first appointment, Dr. Wilson laid out exactly what needed to be done, gave us a time frame for the work to be completed with cost estimates, and hand made her a set of temporaries that looked better than any of the final crowns from the other dentists we had worked with.  He performed laser dentistry on her gums to give her a bigger smile, used the KOR whitening system to give her a bright white color to her teeth, and put on two new crowns that he gets from a lab in Hollywood, CA.  I can proudly say today that my wife has a beautiful smile that she is so proud of thanks to the work of Dr. Wilson and his staff at Signature Smiles.  They are now offering laser filings that can be done with no numbing or drilling.  If you are a new patient, they offer a free Smile Evaluation that includes a panoramic X-ray.  I have referred many customers to them because of my belief in the work they do.

From cleaning to root canal services, I have had comfortable, painless, and easy sessions with Dr. Wilson and the staff.  He utilizes the latest technology including laser, easy and non invasive X-Ray sessions, and new ways of imagery when viewing bone structure.  I want to also send accolades to the front reception area as well.  The associates are so very friendly and helpful.  They were a great help with my insurance questions and very helpful on every thing I needed as far as administrative information. name: Mary Robinson
text:
I recently won a Sheer Whitening Gift Certificate at Blue valued at $149. I scheduled my appointment with the dental rep and asked what I could expect. She told me to plan to be there about an hour. They would clean, polish and then give me the Sheer Whitening treatments. Wow, I thought, pretty good prize. I proceeded to ask what kind of whitening treatments they used, 5 day strips, ugh, I thought, oh well.

Unfortunately, I arrived for my appointment about 10 minutes late, however, not intentional. The receptionist was a bit unfriendly and I thought maybe it was because I was late. Shortly, a dental assistant came to me with a clip board and 5 pages to fill out. I completed my basic information and soon realized they were wanting more info than was totally necessary to claim a prize. I began scanning over the pages and stopped immediately. They were asking me everything from signing to consent to pay for the charges they would render to me today and insurance could not be filed to authorizing them to obtain my dental records from my current dentist. I proceeded to the receptionist and told her there was obviously a mistake, I was asked to fill out patient paperwork and that I was only there to redeem my gift certificate. She told me to proceed completing the paperwork so that they could keep it on file. I looked at her in disbelief and sat back down placing the pen under the clip. I guess she signaled the assistant who came out and retrieved my paperwork. I waited for over 30 minutes before they called me back. I followed the assistant back to a dental room and she handed me a box of strips and about 5 minutes of instruction. Do you have any questions? I said, "Are we done?", she said yes that's it. Hmm, so they led me to believe that the cleaning and polishing were part of my prize when really they were going to bill me for this when they were finished. I guess I didn't fall for their trap. Talk about deceitful, a good reputable business does not do business this way. I will not be back. I will still use my strips, but could have got them at Wal-mart for $12.00. What a joke. Watch out?

My personal experience has shown that Dr. Teichmiller is extremely knowledgeable, skillful and precise and I would go to no one else.

name: Tracey Walker
text: This dental office didn’t Inform me there was a $97 initial consultation fee before they took me through all the paperwork and the informational tour of the office. I felt like I was at a hard sell timeshare experience. The dentist was very professional but the practice of not informing a new patient of charges that are unexpected is unprofessional. I have never paid any money with my dental insurance provider  and nor could they tell me how much insurance would pay if I visited for another appointment so I would recommend you check first because they aren’t forthcoming with costs nor insurance but they will offer all the fluff of cookies baked daily, and blankets on your lap, MS Alabama beauty queen provider ect. Which personally I would prefer to keep my $97 than have all the fluff.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We did forget to tell you of the first visit fee, and we take full responsibility for that. It was an error on our part, and definitely not how we like to run our practice. We regret any inconvenience and frustration this caused. We have subsequently filed this with your insurance, and anticipate this will be reimbursed. Thank you, and please let us know if you have further questions or concerns.

name: Andrew Maxwell

I’ve had  multiple visits and I have come to love the dentist.  I’ve had little to no pain during my appointments and always leave with a smile. Truly confident and experienced dental staff that is top notch. As for Dr. Teichmiller, she is a gentle angel who I will recommend to everyone I see. I’m blessed to have found them.

text: Best dentist and staff in this area! Very nice godly ppl that are willing to go above and beyond! Def my new dentist!

text: All staff members were professional, friendly, and intentional in making the experience pleasant and tailored to my needs and wants. Would recommend to anyone!

text: This was my first visit here, and it was fantastic. Super friendly staff. Dr. Barnes was great. Going forward, they will take care of all of my dental needs. I highly recommend them.

text: The best dentist visit I've ever had. Dr. Teichmiller is very kind and caring. Perfect for anyone that has dental anxiety! I would highly recommend her to anyone.

name: Lauren Faulkner
text: This office is amazing! Highest quality service I’ve ever experienced. The Dr. and staff treated me to complimentary coffee, snacks and fresh baked cookies! They answered all of my questions and made my choice an easy one. ! have NEVER experienced such a “spa” service in dental care. I’ll be back forever!

name: Dustin Bates
text: So I had a terrible mouth.  With an abscessed broken molar.  I hadn't been to the dentist in 10 year or more.  My last experience was a terrible one.  I mean I know I haven't taken care of them.  Not once did the office make me feel bad or lecture me.  They were kind and gentle and made the process as comfortable as removing a tooth could possibly be.  I was terrified of having work done.  I was only there "because I had to be." I Even told them that.   Well not only is the team amazing here.  But Dr Barnes who removed my tooth made it an easy and smooth process.  At no point in the procedure did I hurt nearly as bad as I had the morning prior.  It literally blew my mind how little pain and discomfort, I felt during the process.  Major kudos to this team.  I'm not scared to go back.  Heck I'm kinda looking forward to it.  Can't wait to have a good smile and feel confident to show off my teeth again.  Oh and it was very very affordable.  Now looking back it seems silly how big a nightmare I thought it was going to be compared to how it really was.  Don't put it off!!!  Do it today with this team.  You won't regret it.  Excellent job!

name: Patresa Hubbard
text: This is the dentist god, I can’t say this about any other dentist. The courtesy and professionalism is over the top. I’m not a fan of the dentist, but all my anxiety went away after meeting Dr. Stephanie, she is simply amazing .The entire staff made it a easy transition to do business with them. Efficient, knowledgeable, and everything is explained to your understanding. Thank you all for making me feel comfortable.

name: Jamie Phillips
text: LOVE Dr Stephanie Teichmiller and Mallory! From the very first phone call to schedule an appointment to the consultation, I have never felt more relaxed and truly cared for! So happy to begin this journey to a healthy smile!

name: Ashley Goble
text: We have had many, many dentists due to my husband’s Army career, and Dr. Teichmiller is hands down the most advanced, professional and efficient dentist office I have ever been in. She and all her staff are friendly, warm and inviting. She takes her time with each of her patients. I can’t recommend Decatur Smiles enough!

name: Rebecca Garrett
text: Dr. Stephanie and her staff are the freaking bomb!!! I drove from Atlanta and it was worth every mile!! Visiting this office is an “experience” from the time you walk in the door until the time you leave!! I have never been treated so nicely!! I was offered so many goodies from the freebies to the snacks (not to mention the personalized note with my name on it). I was also given a tour of the office and received full details on the technology and different procedures offered in the office. Dr. Stephanie met with me prior to getting down to business and asked all the important questions. It’s very obvious she has a passion for what she does. She took it a step further and blocked out some time for me considering I drove in from Atlanta. She wanted to ensure we made the most of our time together and our visit today. Let’s just say I was blown away!! Best dentist office visit ever, hands down!!!! I wish I could click more than just 5 stars!! ❤️ S/N for my next consult she even suggested a FaceTime visit to confirm everything, so I wouldn’t have to drive back and forth!!! #PatientForLife😁😁

name: D Tice
text: I just wanted to say how understanding and caring this office is... I no longer dread going to the dentist office!  They make sure their appointments are on time...no more waiting an hour to see the dentist.   Dr. T uses up-to-date procedures and can take care of all of your dental needs and she does all this with a gentle and concerned attitude I actually fell asleep while she was refilling an old filling!  If you're looking for an excellent dentist office.... you found it with Dr T and staff.

Dr. Teichmiller was amazing at meeting my needs and also explaining what was going on with my dental health. She provided me with her expert opinion and what options I had available. Truly appreciate this dental practice as a whole as all were warm, welcoming, inviting and accommodating!

Thank you!!

name: Joanna May-Rouse
text: Great experience! Everyone is extremely professional and has a caring spirit!

name: Freddie Jones
text:
Initial call last week I was told, over the phone, that initial exam was $37 and I DID NOT have to pay up front and my insurance would be billed. I was very specific when I asked the question. At check out, true enough, I paid $37 but in order to schedule my next 2 appointments I had to pay $130. What part of having to pay $130 to schedule my next 2 appointments is not paying up front when that's the exact question I asked when I called initially.

So why a 3 and not 1? Very detailed consultation/expectations and they give you snacks and a water ! 😂

resp.text: Hi Freddie and thanks for the feedback. We are pleased to hear you are happy with the care you received in our office and we enjoyed serving you! As we shared with you on the phone, the first New Patient appointment is not “prepaid.” As for the second appointment, all new patients prepay. We apologize for any miscommunication regarding this. It is important to Dr. Teichmiller and the rest of the team that we are communicating effectively with our patients and we will take this opportunity to review our communication with patients regarding this. Thanks again and we look forward to seeing you at your next visit!

I thank God he led me here. Thanks to all of you.

name: Daron Winsett
text: Scheduling coordinator is not friendly nor understanding.  Said I would be charged $125.00 for comprehensive first exam because I missed my first appointment.  I was going to be a new patient and they advertised initial exam as "Free" to new patients.  If you go to their website they are chargeing $49 for new patient consult.  Pam sent me several emails to try get me to reschedule an appointment just to drop that $125 bomb on me.  Looks like I'm going to pay $125 for no exam, and  no consult.  REAL FRIENDLY

resp.text: Hi Daron. We are sorry you feel frustrated with your experience. In order to give our patients the best care possible we reserve time with the dentist for them and we then ask them to do their part by honoring their appointment. When the appointment is confirmed that day and they don’t show up (as happened in this case), we ask them to prepay the $125 to show their commitment to honor their next appointment. We hope that helps clarify things for you and we encourage you to reach out to us if you have additional questions. Thank you.

name: Derrick White
text: Dr. Stephanie and her team are the best!!!  They are your next best friend in dentistry.   It's 's not everyday that you find a team of caring professionals that  really care about what is best for you .

resp.text: Derrick, caring for you and your family is easy!  Your desire to have 'the best' encourages us to be 'our best' for you!  Loving your new smile!!

text:
To the office of Dr Teichmiller
I came to her Office a year ago with a Big problem I’m 61 years old and had a Grinding at night problem .So I’ve had worn my teeth down where I was having a problem of being able to Speak and Eat . So Dr Teichmiller put a lot of thought  on how to work with me and make my smile and being able to Speak better and eat.
So one day after putting a lot of heart into it to make it the best for me getting ready to Retirement she was able to make a case of doing what was right for me. So her and her assistance of her whole office had came up with a game plan. She worked so hard to make everything perfect for my Bite.
I can’t be any more Happy to have found this Dr that put so much into making it right for me I would tell any one to go to her with any problem she will make it right thought  her experience of working you as a person to be one on one. I can’t thank her and her team I feel Blessed to have found her and to make it Right for me and she stands behind her work!

Thank you again
Paul

text: Dr. Teichmiller and staff are awesome. Highly recommended!

text: I cannot say enough good things about my experience at Dr. Teichmiller’s office. The staff is so welcoming and polite. The reception area is comfortable and accommodating. I was pleasantly surprised to be introduced to Dr. Teichmiller and have a brief consult before ever being brought back to a procedure room. Her practices, technology, kind and professional demeanor have completely won me over and I couldn’t imagine ever going to see another dentist.

name: Tim Hall
text: I felt like family from the first day! I am complimented every day on my teeth and I am grateful for my choice of where I got them!

name: Tassy Stanley
text: L❤️VE L❤️VE L❤️VE me some Dr.  Teichmiller and her gang. I’ve been going to this dentist for many years and I love the service I receive both medically and up front at the desk. They have a great balance between being able to be professional while making you feel like your HOME.

name: Keith Kizer
text: First let me say that we have a great group of dentist in Huntsville that take care of our son Kendall and one of them referred us to Dr. Teichmiller in Decatur due to extensive dental surgery that Kendall will have to undergo over the next year. The 70 mile round trip is worth the drive. Dr. Teichmiller and her staff are wonderful people and make each visit a pleasure. They treat Kendall as if he is the only patient in the world. Thank you for EVERYTHING!

text: Wonderful dentist and very friendly staff!

text: After a major disappointment with my former dentist I decided to check out Dr. Teichmiller.  Wow!  What a difference!  Not only is Dr. Teichmiller warm, friendly, professional and seriously skilled, her office and her entire staff are the most "client friendly" I have ever encountered!  They seem determined to pamper and spoil you - I'm definitely happy with all I've received so far ...  Susan Young

text: Dr. Teichmiller and her staff are great. The staff are very friendly. The office staff always greet you with a smile and the dental assistances are very knowledgeable and do a thorough job. name: Marcus Luckett
text: my  name is is Marcia Luckett I am a new patient of Dr. Teichmiller before last week I have not visit a dentist office in yrs because of fear and bad experiences of other dentists.  I saw Dr Teichmiller Decatur dailey ad  in the paper and cut it out and kept looking at the befores and afters photos for months before I got the courage to go. Last wk was the best dentist visit I ever had, honestely I didn't want to leave. The staff was polite,caring and just awesome!!!!!!!! Dr. Teichmiller was professional and took the time to answer my questions and concerns and never rushed me.   I am excited to final get the smile I wanted for years  but mostly no more toothaches. I truly thank GOD for leading me to DR. Teichmiller  she is one in a million!!!!!!!!

name: Mary Allen
text:
For most of my life I have been embarrassed by the appearance of my teeth in pictures and when smiling.  I have been aware of Dr. Teichmiller's reputation for her skill, and priority to offer the latest in options that would be best for me.
Upon evaluation, she accessed my needs and customized a plan for the work I needed.  I will admit I was concerned regarding the discomfort I might be dealing with due to the extensive nature of my work.  To my relief and surprise, I was never in pain during the whole process.  My procedures were always treated with care and she was keenly aware of my comfort.
Today, I have beautiful teeth that I am not only proud of but I'm always happy to smile and share Dr. Stephanie Teichmillers talent for creating my bright and much more youthful smile.  I have been told I even look younger.  Who doesn't love that?
Thank you Dr. Stephanie Teichmiller for all you have done to give me a reason to SMILE!

text: I saw this dentist several years ago and I did not remember why I wasn't going to go back. I went in today for a cleaning and the minute he walked in the room I was reminded why I will never visit this office again. He is impolite, insensitive, and can't relate to me effectively. The ladies at the front desk are very nice and professional and so is the lady that cleaned my teeth. Needless to say I will never give him my business again.

text: I've been going to see Dr. Walker since I was 18. I'm 47 now. He's a very nice guy and knows his profession very well. I feel like I'm visiting family when I go there. Everyone is very nice to me and always answers any questions I may have. If you wanna keep your teeth looking good and feel comfortable doing it then go see Dr. Walker and his great staff.

name: Cortney Moon
text: Dr. Walker was absolutely amazing!  I have a true fear of the dentist and he and his staff made me feel very comfortable.  I would highly recommend him to anyone.

name: AJS Williams
text: Dr. Walker was absolutely great with my daughter, was so nervous and she said she couldn't even feel the shot. Girl up front was so patient with my insurance. No other place would try to help me with a estimate or take our brand. We will definitely be back to that office.

name: Melissa Crusoe
text: Dr. Walker is the best dentist I have had! He is very professional and knows his craft well! AND his staff is professional and very skilled! I highly recommend Dr. Thomas Walker's Dentristy for all your dentistry needs!

name: Richard Howell
text: Staff is incompetent and severly lacking in training. Worst dentist office I have ever been to. I am 58 yrs old and have had a lot of dental work done. These people don't have a clue about what they are doing. They will lie and make up things in an attempt to cover up their incompetence. Don't waste your money. Save yourself a lot of pain and definitely avoid this office.

name: Brittany Richards
text: Dr. Walker has been my dentist since I was a child. I'm almost positive he worked on my first tooth! Even as a kid I felt comfortable and loved him as my dentist. As an adult, I feel the exact same and have always been extremely loyal to Dr. Walker. His office is always clean, my visit is always fast and his staff are always wonderful to talk with. He moved from Irondale (originally up on the hill) to Trussville (closer to me so that's a win!) and I'd follow him again. My entire family uses Dr. Walker and I highly recommend him as a dentist for patients of any age. He's the reason I have the awesome smile I do! :)

name: Kathryn Lopresti
text: Friendly and experienced employees. They become like family after a few cleanings or dental work. I have seen Dr Walker over 15 years.

text: Great atmosphere!! Very clean and patient oriented office..

name: Heather Snyder
text: The staff is amazing!!!!!!!!! Great experience they were very helpful and made me feel right at home  ! I will be back!!!!!!!

name: Mindy Lambert
text: I would highly recommend!!!

name: Sharon Foust-Mills (Sharon)
text: Great dentist. Had to get a tooth removed when root canal from a previous dentist went bad. He understands that you might be on a limited budget, he's straight forward about the priorities needing repaired.

name: Charlotte C
text: I'm giving this place one star ONLY because this program requires it to leave a rating.  BAD DENTIST.  DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME AND MONEY!!! This dentist is BAD!  First of all he is VERY rough.  The front desk personnel AND the dentist have a BAD attitudes - perhaps being married and working together all day every day is not a good idea.  This dentist's hand are so big which causes even more problems for someone with a tiny mouth.  I had a filling replaced here, within a day it was obvious that something wasn't right so I returned to this dentist to have it repaired, he made an adjustment and after a week I was still having discomfort, when I called to get back in they couldn't fit me in right away and I had to travel out of town for a couple of months, as time went by the discomfort turned to PAIN.  When I returned home I made an appointment with a DIFFERENT dentist office to have the tooth/filling looked at - the filling was cracked and missing parts in 3 places and when this new dentist started taking it out - it was obvious that the filling material never set up properly as the filling was soft.  I would NEVER go to this dentist again for anything!!!!  AND they have very bad business practices because they refuse to give me a refund!  Perhaps it is time for him to retire!!!!!!!!  BAD DENTIST!!!

name: Brian Dasinger
text: Wonderful experience at Dr. Hart’s office!  Thorough check ups, great communication on billing and benefits, and painless dental work for my little ones!

name: Alia Mizelle
text: I do not recommend. I'm not sure what has happened since the previous reviews but it was not clean, cluttered and crunched into a tiny exam room, my husband and I both had appointments. The assistant was untrained and unfamiliar with the supplies he needed. Dr. Hart moved very slowly, bluntly placed the instruments on our chest in between using them, the exam and cleaning were both, the most painful and least thorough we've had. We drove 2 hours for a holistic dentist, not what their website portrays. If Dr. Hart is ill or they have fallen on hard times...God bless them but; the patient shouldn't be the one to suffer.

name: Theresa Yankovoy
text: I had a very relaxing and thorough dental cleaning. Melissa makes tooth cleaning seem like a gum massage. I am very sensitive, and Dr Hart and his staff really make me feel at home and relaxed. I travel to see him. I have tried local dentists, but I always go back to Hart. He is truly the very best dentist on the Gulf Coast.

name: RC 0093
text: They are very helpful and kind. I'm glad that I found them! They've worked with me, and helped me tremendously. Nothing negative about this place! The front desk and staff are all very pleasant in my experiences.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind review we appreciate that very much!!

name: Leah Brymer
text: Great visit. Mr. Hart is a great dentist who share great information with you about your teeth/mouth health.

resp.text: Thanks for the great view that means alot to our practice!!

name: Roy Daniels
text: Dr.Dayton Hart really knows how to make his patients feel comfortable during their visits. The staff enhances this by being extremely genuine and nice at all times. Thanks guys. Can't wait for my next visit.

name: Jackson Gibbs
text: I honestly would recommend my dentist because he is beyond friendly and professional during each dental visit. He really goes out of his way to make you feel comfortable and explains everything thoroughly.

name: Jack Walker
text: Awesome dentist! Dr. Hart's office is actually quite peaceful, plus he is very nice. So if you are someone who gets nervous about dentist appointments, this would be a great place for you!

text: I love the team and their biological approach to dentistry. But their office majorly needs to be cleaned, organized and updated. Every room is very cluttered and not professional-looking. I also always wait 25-35 minutes after arriving, even when I arrive before my appointment time. Also it's very strange to me why, as biological dentists, they have a cookie baking oven in their waiting room and brochures from companies that use fluoride and other nonbiological dentistry tools.

name: Douglas Coleman
text: The dental hygienist that helped me was super professional as well as courteous. I have always had such a positive and informative dental visit every single time I go.

name: Steven Page
text: Dr. Hart is constantly going out of his way and beyond my expectations to help me as best he can and it's something i always notice and appreciate. He's a stand up guy and a wonderful dentist.

name: Thelma Santiago
text: Dr Hart  and his  staff  are  professional and  friendly. I  highly recommend him to all my friends and family.

name: Thomas Reed
text: I have many great things that I could say about Dr. Hart and his staff. I think the highest compliment I can pay them is for being a happy patient for over 20 years.

name: marie Kalantzis
text: This place is so unprofessional and not sanitized at all. Disorganized and cluttered, I felt like I needed to take a bath as soon as possible. Hygenist kept giving me excuses as to why their instruments didn't work, including their exray machine and had the gall to charge me $155 for half a cleaning, she told me I had some sort of gum infection but didn't offer anything to make it better. When i asked to see the dentist I was told he'll come in as soon as he was finished with his other patient, so I waited and waited till I decided to get up and go.What a dump. If I could rate this place as a zero I would have. STAY AWAY.

text: Front desk have a really bad attitude.

text: Dr. Hart has always taken great care of me and my smile. He spends time with me at each appointment answering my questions and making sure I'm comfortable.

text: Dr. Cook is fantastic. He's incredibly gentle and caring. His staff is friendly and helpful. I actually look forward to going to his office. text: Dr. Cook and staff are very timely and care about their patients. I have had cleanings, fillings and routine checkups with Dr. Cook. The hygienists are great. Cleanings are very comfortable. Thank you staff at Cook Family Dentistry!  My mom and I enjoy every visit we make to see you all and look forward to all of our cleanings!

I highly recommend Cook Family and Cosmetic Dentistry.   I am always greeted with a smile.   The hygienists are excellent. If you like a very friendly caring and professional atmosphere,  this is the place.

Sincerely

Gary Niven

It only took a few minutes to fix what I thought would be a long and painful process. He is a skilled and caring physician. I am happy to have him as my dentist!

text: This is the absolute best dentist I have ever been to. I love the staff and Dr. Cook has done a wonderful job with my teeth. I hope I never have to go anywhere else!
