text: Love this dentist and his staff, always friendly and very patient. Never been so comfortable at a dentist office.  Takes his time and gives quality care, I highly recommend Dr. Cook!!!!!

resp.text: Thank You Taquita! You are so thoughtful and we appreciate sweet patients like you!

name: Alicia Cook
text: Dr. Cook is a very gentle dentist.  He has a friendly staff too.  I've had several fillings at his office and it was a smooth and painless experience.  Highly recommend!!

name: Bethany Gray
text: After an extensive google search for dentists in the Birmingham area, I chose Dr. Cook's practice; so my review is titled, "Who does that anymore?" After a rotten experience with Affordable Dentures, I called Dr. Cook's office, explained my dental situation including my short three week timeline to have everything done in order for me to be able to return to my teaching position in Alaska and was given an initial appt. within two days. A plan of action for a misplaced implant and new upper denture were made that very day. Four short appointments later I walked out with a new perfect denture and smile! But, in between that short block of time I had in the dental chair with Dr. Cook, kudos go out to his wonderful staff as they called often for an answer to a question Dr. Cook had, easily accommodated me with their appts. versus my other doctor appointments, called and made an appt. for me with an oral surgeon for further consultation on my misplaced implant(Affordable Dentures). They also provided kids with a toy choice from their Treasure Chest instead of a lollipop and listened to my crazy life living in 'bush' Alaska. Dr. Cook and his staff are thorough, accommodating, gentle, good listeners and make you feel like you are their only patient for that day!!!! They are now my only choice for dental care!!!!

name: Kelley Frank
text: Dr Cook and his entire staff are wonderful!!! They have helped me so much. I will never look for another dentist even if I moved....

I thought I had a really good Dentist in the past, but Dr. Kyle Parks surpassed them all! Not only is he very knowledgeable, but he is kind and caring.
I had a lot of dental issues in the past, and recently, and Dr. Parks and his staff make me feel not so scared and took very good care of  me.
The girls in the front office are as nice & sweet as can be. Treated me with respect, and pretty much acted as if I were their only patient.
I feel blessed to have found such a great Dentist, along w/their wonderful staff. 🙂

name: Angie Underwood
text: This dental trip was very much past due for myself.Wonderful trip,the Dr was sooo good to me,as well as her assistant.I give these folks a 10!Never had a dental visit an taken laughs w the ladies whom helped me.I am truly grateful an anyone needs true dental care make an appointment w them,b4 u call anybody else.The charge was a good price,the care,an it took 2hrs to get my 2 teeth pulled,Dr added stitches too,incase I might needed them,takin thought about my after care at home,that's nice!!!

name: Ryoma
text: I called and friendly lady answered the phone. I tried to contact the dentist in the emergency number twice and he did not answer.

resp.text: Hi Ryoma, we received your voicemail but unfortunately it was breaking up and we couldn’t hear the entirety of your message. Please give us a call here at the office 256-723-8833 and we would be more than happy to help.

name: Dedra McCoy
text: I could not ask for better. They are some of the best people a person could meet. Our experience was the greatest. A person could not go wrong in making an appointment with these people. Very gentle.

text: Dr. Parks and her staff are friendly and helpful. I had a filling done. They checked on me several times while waiting for the anesthesia to work. Another thing I like about their office is the view from the windows... while the hygienist is working I can watch the clouds and birds.

text: Today I went in and got to meet Dr.Parker (her). She was super nice and willing to give advice on what needed to be done. The staff is so welcoming and makes you feel like home. They are in no rush and everyone is so willing to listen. Highly recommend this office!

text: This was our first visit as a family and they were AMAZING!! I would definitely recommend them. They are super friendly for kids and adults. You will not be disappointed.

text: Great dentist and a great staff!! I never thought I would ever say that I love going to the dentist. Great experience and they truly care about you!!

text: First visit, felt so comfortable, grand daughter, got cleaning for the first time and was not stressing at all., Every one was extremely nice. I have to go to Oral Surgeon, and Dr. Parks got appointment fast for me, I'm so grateful. Marie

text: The staff is so awesome and it's always clean. They have coloring activities for the children while they wait and awesome surprises in the treasure box at the end. The doc is so sweet and really cares for his patients. I highly recommend them for all of your dental needs.

text: Dr McMillan and his staff are the absolute best. I have avoided going to the dentist for 7 or so years due to having had bad experiences, this dentistry has completely changed that!! They are all so patient and compassionate. Highly recommended!!

The staff was knowledgeable, warm and friendly. I HIGHLY recommend these folks!!

name: Evelyn McElyea
text: First visit, felt so comfortable, grand daughter, got cleaning for the first time and was not stressing at all., Every one was extremely nice. I have to go to Oral Surgeon, and Dr. Parks got appointment fast for me, I'm so grateful. Marie

name: Natalie Royal
text: New Hope Family Dentistry has been our family dentist for over 3 years, we are blessed to have such an outstanding office in our little town. High tech and clean, we don’t know why anyone would drive to Huntsville or further. They have TVs on the ceiling for you to keep your attention off of what’s going on inside your mouth, AND MASSAGE CHAIRS!!!! The chairs are the best! Also, everyone we’ve met on the staff is fantastic! Don’t know how they remember our names when we are only in their Twice per year! If your looking for a dentist, check out New Hopes Family Dentistry!

name: Joseph Motes
text: Awesome family atmosphere and wonderful with little kids. My little girl was scared to death and didn’t like her old dentist. The team at New Hope Family Dentistry went above and beyond to make the experience as easy and stress free for her. Now my five year old loves going!

text: I have been to many different dentists and this one is by far my favorite! I live an hour away but will make the drive any day to come here! Everyone is so friendly and caring when you come in! They have worked with me throughout my pregnancy to make sure that what needs fixed gets fixed and that we don't cause harm to the baby in any way. I couldn't ask for a better or friendlier dentist to go to! I recommend this dentist to anyone!

name: L Stroud
text: I recently had dental implants done by Dr. McMillan and could not be more pleased. The procedure itself was  basically painless and there was only minor discomfort afterwards. I have previously used oral surgeons for this type of dental work, but from now on, I will definitely be calling on Dr. McMillan. He is the nicest person and it's very easy to discuss your concerns with him. He and his entire staff are the friendliest folks you would ever hope to meet and they will go out of their way to help you and make you feel comfortable from the moment you walk in the door. OUTSTANDING in every way!

text:
Dr. McMillan, dental  assistants, and hygienist have provided my husband and I with excellent quality work and service. The hygienist provides the deep tissue work my husband requires saving him a trip to Huntsville. This is the first dentist to provided me with an upper dentures that fit perfectly the first time with no adjustments. The partial was took some work. The office staff is extremely competent and helpful with appointments, insurance issues and has even provided me a report needed for a taxes.
Personal comfort, excellent care and professionalism is what I expect and receive.
Would I recommend Dr. McMillan?  YES, I have and do.

name: Nikki Sumner
text: This is the best dentist that I have ever been to. I went in last week with a toothache that was not really hurting anymore. Dr. McMillan told me I needed a root canal.so I schedule it. Well as the week went on my tooth didn't hurt. I almost canceled my appointment but decided to go in anyways. When he came in the room I asked him are you sure I need this done. I dont want to go through any unnecessary pain. He allowed me to watch him perform the test on each tooth on the upper right side. After that I agreed it need to be done. He could tell I was nervous so he offered yo do a live camera so I could see what he was doing. All I can say is "IT WAS AMAZING." Thank you to all the wonderful staff at New Hope Family Dentistry.

text: I absolutely love Dr. McMillan and all his staff. They are all very professional and always reassure me that I am in good company. So many great things to say about these ladies!!  We have been walked through every step from making appointments to end of visits.  We were both anxious about coming but the smiling faces made everything better!  I had Mrs. Tessa and my husband had Ms. Stephanie for teeth cleaning...wonderful experience for both.  Mrs. Tia is great and quick to do her job; she knows what she is doing!!!
I dreaded getting my cavity filled because of the bad experience I had had elsewhere years ago.  Here was the opposite end of the spectrum--great experience, no pain, and way less noise.
The front office ladies are wonderful to explain things as well!  Very well organized and they know the business without having to put you on hold.
Best dentist office I've been to!!!!!

name: Jamie Jenkins
text: I'm new to the area as of June 2020. I've had lots of Dental work in the past and so I'm the nervous type. The hygienist Kelsey was so super sweet and talked me through everything. Dr. Rutledge was even better! He talked me through our game plan and made me feel so reassured that I'd be greatly taken care of. At the end of my appointment I had to schedule my next one and Kelsey asked the receptionist to put me on her schedule. That made me feel awesome!!! I'm so glad I've chosen this clinic to be my forever dentist!!

name: Tina Schutz
text:
I had my very first toothache at 45 years-old and I was given Dr. Rutledge’s name by a friend but warned that he was difficult to get into see. I called on a Monday and received an appointment just two days later on Wednesday, February 11, 2021 at 2:00pm. I was there 30 minutes before my appointment and sent a text (as requested by the office) to let them know I was there.

Jada brought out the paperwork I needed to fill out as a new patient and requested I text the office phone number when finished. She took my insurance card and driver’s license to make copies while I filled out the very simple paperwork. The paperwork was basic and took no time at all. I sent a message when I was ready.

Shannon was Dr. Rutledge’s assistant. She did my X-ray where the toothache was and talked with me and about my dental history. I was comfortable with her immediately. She explained everything she was going to do before she did it.

Dr. Rutledge came in and was INCREDIBLE! He diagnosed what was wrong quickly. I was super surprised to find out I had a cracked tooth! He went over all options with me and we chose the best plan for me. My appointment with him was set up as a consultation only and I was afraid it would be a while before I could get in to have the work done he suggested but boy was I wrong!

Casey is the wonderful lady who is in charge of checking out Dr Rutledge’s patients and she set up my appointment for m, MONDAY, February 15, 2021! I only had to wait four days to have the work done! Casey is a ROCKSTAR!

I will return on Monday, February 15, 2021 to have a crown and possible root canal. I’m not nervous at all. I know that I am in great hands with the ladies of the office and Dr. Rutledge is just a bonus!! Stay tuned for the review post procedure!!!!

name: Brian Steiner
text: This place is absolutely awesome! Dr Rutledge was really cool and explained to me in detail any questions I had. Also, the hygienist I had was the best! Actually looking forward to coming back for my next appointment!

resp.text: We're looking forward to your next appointment, too!

name: Penelope Taylor
text: I messaged Dr Martin after hours for a bad toothache. He called me right back and had me in first thing the next morning. I’m a baby when it comes to teeth and he is always so caring and mindful. His staff are also genuinely nice and helpful.

resp.text: We're so glad that we were able to help!

name: Nancy Litch
text: My appointment was on time. The practice uses careful COVID-19 precautions. The hygienist did an excellent job cleaning my teeth. Dr. Rutledge was timely and thorough in his examination. Everyone was very friendly and professional. I highly recommend this dental practice.

resp.text: Thank you, Nancy! Glad we made you feel safe.

name: Josie Frantz
text: I highly recommend this dentist ! I had a dental emergency and they were the only ones who got me in . They are also very friendly and Dr Rutledge was great very good beside manor .

name: Karen Wise
text:
Professional and everyone was very kind.
Would definitely recommend!!

name: John Lankford

name: Keisha Triplett-Ellis

I will be returning for more work, but as someone with some severe anxieties about dental work, I believe I am in very good hands.

name: Dr. Nikki Cottis
text: I had a great experience for a routine cleaning. When I called to make my appointment, the girls at the front were friendly and knowledgeable. They were very timely with my appointment. I highly recommend both doctors!

name: Karen Payton
text: Staff always friendly and courteous, my hygienist Michele was wonderful.

name: Tammye Dearing
text: The staff and doctors were friendly and very helpful. I felt very comfortable being my first time there. Was able to go in the day I called with a toothache. I was shocked but very happy since I was hurting. Would highly recommend.

name: Sleepless SLPLSSINAL
text:
Love Dr. Martin And entire team very friendly, caring and gentle.
Looking forward to my next visits.

name: melissa harris
text: They got me in 5 min early. Everyone had a mask on.  the dental office was very clean. Very nice dentist I've seen them both in the past and they are both great  they knew I was really worried about covid got me in got me out. felt very comfortable at this office. Deffinatly would recommend

name: Frances Squire
text: I needed an emergency visit because of a broken crown. Dr. Rutledge and his staff were highly professional and did a great job on a temporary repair and referred me to an oral surgeon for further work. On top of this all, they were very nice people too.

resp.text: Frances, thank you so much for taking the time to write such a kind review! We hope you had a smooth recovery and that we will see you under more pleasant circumstances in the future!

name: Mark Cecil
text: It's very hard to brag on Dr. Rutledge and his staff because my last dentist when I lived in Texas was one of my best friends. As a good friend of my dentist I was treated like a king and could call anytime day or night. I was very sad to lose that connection. I moved to Gulf Shores and went to a new dentist for the first time on over 20 years. I could not be happier!!! These guys are great and make me feel just as important. I have never waited more than 10 minutes on any of my appointments.

resp.text: Hey Mark! We're so glad to have you as part of our practice. Thanks for the great review!

name: Caleb Terry
text: The dentist always makes me incredibly nervous but the staff were very friendly and reassuring. Dr. Rutledge was great and talked me through everything he was doing. I’ll be scheduling all my future appointments there!

resp.text: Caleb, we thank you for your kind words and are really happy to hear you will be coming back! You're the best!

name: Jim Meyer

text: Get your wallet ready, exaggerated high prices for teeth implans, Although it does good work with easy things, Dr Rutledge did unprofessional filling on a teeth (+1 more person )wich later on caused a lot of pain needing another visit to a different doctor to solve the issue, do some research before visit.

name: D Washington
text:
The staff is awesome from the the time i made a phone call to be seen while traveling to Gulf Shores  until i checked out. Very friendly and welcoming environment. If you need a dentist in the Gulf Shores area you will not be disappointed. Pain free as well for my emergency filling.

resp.text: We are so happy that you chose our office and placed your trust in our team. We were happy to help and glad you had a good visit! Thank you for the review!

name: Sue Ellen Jeruzal

name: Ashlea Palmer
text: I am a big baby when it comes to going to the dentist however when I moved to Gulf Shores 8 years ago I knew I needed to find a new dentist to continue my yearly check ups/cleanings. She told me about her wonderful experience with him as well as his staff with them making her feel comfortable and taking their time with her as she was very anxious. Once I heard this I knew I had to see him. It was the best decision I ever made. The staff accommodates you when you're nervous and especially for ones like me who have very sensitive teeth. My whole family sees Dr Martin and have had nothing but wonderful experiences. I highly recommend him!!

resp.text: Hey Ashlea, thank you for the great review! We're happy you're a patient of ours!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words! That really means a lot and glad we were able to help you!

They make going to the dentist a pleasurable experience!

text: I had to make a last minute appointment due to severe pain and they were open till 7pm on Tuesday. The service was excellent and Dr. Ward is the best. They are the Best.

text: Magnificent. Dr. Yarnell and his team are so attentive and great when it comes to nervous patients who fear the dentist like me. I had two cavities filled and I didn't feel a thing. text: Simply the best dental experience one could hope for. The team there is very professional, considerate and caring. The way they approach things will make one want to continue going there. We are very pleased with this practice.

text: The staff was great . Worked hard to get my insurance worked out. The reviews that says no pain is correct . I did not feel any pain when he injected me nor when he extracted the tooth.  . Everything went great .This my new dentist. Thank you guys.

text: Very friendly staff and went over and beyond to make my visit very comfortable.

name: Chelsea Lucas
text: Wonderful staff and so friendly at the Northcutt Dental located in Helena! I typically dread going to the dentist but everyone made sure I was comfortable. They fully explained why I was having certain problems, their recommendation on treatment plans, and other benefits that could help my overall oral health. Definitely recommend this dental practice!!

name: Angel Tillman
text: I really wanted to like this dentist's office.  It's very efficient and clean.  The work is done promptly.  I did not care for the first hygienist I had, so I asked to have her replaced.  The second was much better and the third hygienist was the best I've ever had.  However, when I first switched to Northcutt, it was because my previous dentist retired.  I was told that a filling I had received needed to be replaced.  I was reluctant, because it wasn't giving me any pain or problems, but I had it replaced.  After the replacement, the dentist said he needed to replace his own work (no charge)  so he did.  Then I started having a lot of pain from the 2nd replacement.  He worked on it a 3rd time.  The last time I went in, he expressed that the whole tooth needed to be crowned - lest I eventually need a full root canal.  (this time charged of course)  Needless to say, I will have to be getting a second opinion.  I cannot have the same tooth worked on 5 times unless it truly is necessary.

name: Jody Glass
text: Great staff. Goes the extra mile to make you comfortable. Speaks with you through out the visit to keep you informed.

name: Moth and Wolf
text: I haven't been to a dentist in a long time. They took the time to explain to me what was going on, calmed my worries, and handled me with care. Couldn't recommend them enough.

name: Gene Horton
text:
Kind and gentle care. Very personable staff. And I didn't feel judged for not having taken better care of my dental health. They just wanted to help me get better.

Friendly staff from the telephone call through the stitches.

name: Tamika M. Arnold
text: The staff at Northcutt is always kind and courteous. They also do an amazing job explaining out of pocket cost that allow patients to plan better for future care.

name: Jeremy
text: One of the best dental business I have ever had the pleasure of being.

text: Had terrible experience with aspen dental. Went to Northcutt Dental and had the best experience.  All the staff is wonderful. name: Hazel Byerly
text: Great place to come if you need dental work done. The staff is nice and friendly and they take really good care of thier patients.

The Business Associate, at the front desk greet you by standing with a friendly welcome home smile, the Living Room is absolutely beautifully decorated and very clean! The whole office is state of the art!!
Everyone from the front to the back is AWESOME!!
Tyndall was my Hygienist. She was AWESOME! She was very thorough & and explained everything to me.
The Whole Team is Very sweet and knowledgeable.
Dr. Yarnell & Dr. Nguyen are both Great!

I was offered bottled water, watched HGTV with no down time, received attention from at least 4 staffers who all called me by name including a pop in visit from Dr Gyuen  (sic) which was unexpected.  All I can say about Northcutt customer service is wow!

name: Kristy Sellers
text: They are just awesome!  Best dentist I've ever had.  They make you feel comfortable.   They're easy on your teeth.  I had 2 pretty good - sized cavities filled and i dont feel sore like you've been massacred.  They do an excellent job!   If you have anxiety regarding dentist,  you need to try them to try them:)

name: Crystal Dietz
text: Today was my first time to go to Northcutt Dental office. From the moment I walked in the door I felt welcomed the staff were so nice. My Family and I won't be going anywhere else but there. Thank you for all the information and wonderful experience.

name: Tammy
text: Everyone was nice and they were all very professional and the work I had to have done was excellent!

name: William Shannan Seelmann
text: The admin staff is friendly and the office is nice and clean. The porcelain crown I had done less than a year ago not only came off tonight but it also has a hole all the way through it. The assistant who adjusted it before it was cemented did not listen to anything I said when she was fitting and drilling on it. I told her the contacts were too tight, but she insisted on adjusting the occlusal (biting surface) until here we are less than a year later with a useless crown. Since we've already moved from Helena, I can't even get Northcutt Dental to make this right. Insurance only pays for 1 crown per tooth every 5 years... I would not recommend this place!

resp.text: I want to thank you for talking with us to discuss your issue. It is our goal to make sure our patients are raving fans of NDP and we want to do all that we can to address your needs upfront. We are sorry that you had this experience and hope you were pleased with our quick response & solution to your concern.

name: Gloria McGee
text: Dr. Ward and the staff at Northcutt are very professional and friendly. The office is very contemporary and welcoming. The staff are all very gentle when administering treatment.  I would highly recommend Northcutt to all for your dental needs.

name: Kakki Brown
text:
A great experience from the moment I walked through the doors! A professional and exceptionally friendly staff who answered all my questions and provided me information to help on future visits. I definitely recommend this Helena based dental practice  to anyone who wants affordable, professional dental care. Special thanks to Dr Yarnell, Tyndall, Sharon, Cynthia, and Katearia. (Hope I got spellings correct!)
Northcutt Dental has become my new dental "home."

name: Alan Farmer
text: The staff at the Helena location are awesome! I took my 16 year old son in for a check-up and cleaning and he really enjoyed it. I highly recommend Northcutt Dental in Helena!

name: Traci Rauccio
text: Absolutely best experience ever . I have a phobia of the dentist ...and the whole staff put me at ease and was patient with me. The dentist cares and is the first dentist to take my Concerns and fear seriously. I won't be going anywhere else.

name: Gene Darden
text: They are the best   informative, high tech, fun and knowledgable.  The staff rocks from front to back.

name: Zahir Merchant
text:
Stay away if you value your money.

They quoted me $17k for my dental work, went somewhere else (which had to redo my x-rays for free because the Northcutt ones were so poor in quality) and they quoted me for around $4k without my insurance, just around $1.5k with it.

The red flag for me to get a second opinion was when they kept pushing a $15 enamel toothpaste. If you look it up on Amazon, you can get the exact same toothpaste in a two pack for the same price.

If a dental office is willing to sell you toothpaste with a 100% markup, you have to imagine what else they're taking advantage of you on.

To be fair, the staff is friendly, and the office is very very nice with games for kids.

But this price gouging is ridiculous, and I think someone has to acknowledge it.

name: Leslie Miller Hoffman
text: Best dentist office I have ever visited! Staff is awesome!

text:
I've hated going to the dentist for years, but Dr. Yarnell at the Helena office and all of his staff are great.

text:
Northcutt Dental has the most attentive professional staff I have experienced ,
thanks Nicole an the rest of the staff

name: Bruce Anderson

text: Deerfoot dental come highly recommended by several people. The staff was kind and charismatic enough to put me at ease while still being professional. My only complaints were they only offered the white fillings when several insurance companies will only pay for silver, while I personally prefer the while on visible teeth I know some people can not afford to pay the difference. My second complaint which is really minuscule was I had a little trouble finding the building with it being behind the pediatrician's office and in the same parking lot without a sign at each parking  lot entrance. The problem was solved with a quick call to clarify their location when I got close.

name: Celena Hathaway
text: My husband, B, had the most amazing experience here! I know...I know...you’re thinking, “How can anyone have an amazing experience at the dentist?” Well, let me tell you. He had a pretty rough time, my husband. He was in a real bad way when he arrived there, and Dr. G did not mince his words. He (probably) said, “Yeah, my man...you’re gunna lose that tooth.” Now, my B was in immense pain and seriously considering pulling his own tooth with a pair of dirty garage pliers. Dr. G (probably) said, “Nay, sir. There’s no need for that. Take these antibiotics, and I’ll see you on Monday to exorcise that evil spiritual entity from your mandible.” Brian was henceforth treated with the absolute best dental care that he’s ever received, and we, as a family, will (not probably—definitely) be forever clients at Deerfoot Dental!

name: Angela Cross
text:
I'll leave my original review below because it still stands however I’d like to update to say while everyone is very nice there you should stay on top of your own benefits and find out ahead of time how much every single thing they do will cost you and then call your insurance yourself and verify that it will be covered (probably a good practice anyway obviously but I just assumed they were on top of it since I was only initially charged a copay only to find out a month later that so much work was done (in a couple of appointments) in an overlapping way that my benefits we're maxed out and they still continued to do more work after that that I wasn't aware wouldn't be covered so I now have a massive bill from them that I definitely didn't see coming. Like I said probably my own fault for trusting someone else to have my best interest in mind and to be on top of something like that but lesson very painfully learned.)

Original review

I have terrible dental anxiety but everyone at Deerfoot Dental has gone above and beyond to help ease that. I highly recommend Deerfoot Dental especially to those who are generally nervous about visiting the dentist. name: Dennis Olinger
text:
So my two year old son fell and busted his mouth on our driveway one evening. His front tooth got knocked in and was terribly crooked. Blood was everywhere...
My wife was at work..and needless to say..I was a little panicked. My wife came home and we started calling dentists. We came to find out that most dentists are closed on Friday..and it was Thursday evening when this occurred. My son has been a patient at Deerfoot Dental since his teeth really started coming through. We left a message after hours and Dr. Grovestein called us back! He asked us to text him photos of my sons teeth. We sent the pics and he called us back. He reassured us that it probably wasn’t as bad as it seems and he would meet us at his office the next morning. So he opened his clinic for us on his day off! I mean who does that? He gave us instructions to care for the tooth, we made a follow up appointment, and left. Needless to say..our sons tooth looks great. It actually straightened out almost back to its original spot. We went to our follow up appointment and got the good news that his teeth looked great and to just keep a watch on it. I have never in my life experienced customer service from a healthcare provider like this. We are still in shock that someone would care so much about the wellbeing of our son. They have earned a customer for life.

Normally I go to the dentist at home but it was an emergency. I woke up one morning with a lot of pain and swelling. I went in and they gave me some antibiotics and ask I return to have the tooth fixed on completion of my antibiotics. The service from this visit was great!
I returned on completion of my antibiotics and that's when the trouble started. They decided I needed to get a root canal on the tooth. It was still very sensitive and painful. The hygienist was very general when taking x-Rays and getting me into my room. The dentist came in and put a bit of numbing medication on my gums. The shot was done before the gum was numb and he started the dental work before the tooth was numb. He would not stop no matter what the hygentist or I did. I walked out of the office in tears and it wasn't until I got to my car the full effect of the numbing medication kicked in. The office staff and hygentist all seemed very upset about how the doctor did this. Needless to say I did not return to have my permanent crown done at this office and for purposes of all emergencies will seek care elsewhere!

text: The entire staff is exceptional, They all work very well together, Great atmosphere. Everyone is very customer oriented and friendly. text: I had a tooth emergency and they were able to see me that day and worked quickly to figure out the problem. All of the staff was very nice and thorough!

name: Zack McGhee
text:
This may be unbelievable, but Northcutt Dental Practice is actually a pleasant place to visit.

I know, I know, what could be so pleasant about a dentistry practice? Everything, to be honest.

The staff are always pleasant and always have a smile ready. They're talkative, and will remember you after only 1-2 visits. Quite a difference from what you will probably find in other practices.

The people actually working on your teeth are very professional and knowledgeable. They know what they're doing and how to get it done with minimal pain. By far the best dental experience I've ever had (and I've had quite a few).

Gentlemen, take note: each and every woman there is a looker. That might not sway your opinion of this establishment, but hey, it doesn't hurt.

In short, Northcutt is the best dental practice around, and if you decide to get some work done, you'll do well to make an appointment with them.
